content: Phoo ntawv nuav yog tej lug kws Mauxes has tseg rua cov Yixalayees thaus puab tseem nyob huv taj suabpuam ntawm ntug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj. Puab nyob ntawm lub Haav Yauladees kws ze Xufes, ntu nruab nraab ntawm lub nroog Palaas, Taufees, Lanpaas, Haxelaus hab Dixahas.
(Yog sawv kev ntawm roob Xinais taug kev hlaa cov pov roob huv tebchaws Edoos moog rua Kades Npane-as mas yog kaum ib nub txhaj txug).
Nub xab ib lub kaum ib hlis ntuj, xyoo plaub caug tom qaab kws cov Yixalayees tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, Mauxes muab Vaajtswv tej lug txhua nqai qha rua cov Yixalayees.

Tej nuav yog tom qaab kws tug TSWV  tau paab cov Yixalayees tua yeej tug Vaajntxwv Xihoos kws kaav cov Amaules huv lub nroog Hesenpoos hab Vaajntxwv Aunkas kws kaav lub nroog Asetalus hab Edeles huv tebchaws Npasaas.
Thaus cov Yixalayees lug nyob huv tebchaws Mau-am ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj, Mauxes muab Vaajtswv tej Kevcai lug qha hab ntuag puab. Mauxes has tas,
“Thaus peb tseem nyob nraag Roob Xinais, tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv has rua peb tas, ‘Mej lug nyob ntawm lub Roob nuav ntev heev lawm;

ca le lauj mej tej tsevntaub hab tsiv tawm qhov chaw nuav moog. Mej moog rua ntawm lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Amaules hab tej cheebtsaam kws nyob ibncig ntawd, moog rua huv lub Haav Yauladees, moog rua sau lub pov roob hab huv tej taj nraag, moog rua cheebtsaam kws nyob saab qaabteb, hab moog rua tom ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees. Moog kuas txug rua tebchaws Kana-aas hab dlhau moog rua peg tej roob huv tebchaws Lenpanoos, hab moog kuas txug rua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates.
Taagnrho tej nuav yog lub tebchaws kws kuv kws yog tug TSWV tau coglug yuav muab rua mej yawmkoob Anplahaas, Ixaj, Yakhauj hab puab tej xeebntxwv. Mej ca le moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.’ ”
Mauxes has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Thaus peb tseem nyob nraag Roob Xinais, kuv has rua mej tas, kuv teg num ntau dlhau hwv lawm, ‘Kuv tuab leeg xwb ua tsi taag.
Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv pub rua mej fuamvaam coob npaum le tej nubqub sau nruab ntug.
Thov tug TSWV kws yog mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv, pub kuas mej fuamvaam ib txheeb npaug ntxiv, hab kuas mej lub neej vaammeej lawv le Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg lawm.
Tabsis kuv ib leeg yuav ua le caag txav txim tau rua mej, thaus mej muaj kev sis caav sis tshe?
Mej ca le xaiv ib cov tuabneeg txawj ntse kws paub qaabhau, cov txivneej kws muaj tswvyim hab paub ua num ntawm txhua xeem tuaj rua kuv. Kuv yuav tsaa puab ua cov thawj saib mej.’
Mej teb kuv has tas, mej pum zoo le kuv has ntawd.

Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj tsaa cov tuabneeg txawj ntse, cov thawjcoj kws paub ua num kws mej xaiv huv mej tej xeem tuaj ua cov coj mej. Ibtxha saib ib txheeb leej, ibtxha saib ib puas leej, ibtxha saib tsib caug leej hab ibtxha saib kaum leej. Hab kuv tseem tsaa ntau tug numtswv ua cov kaav mej txhua xeem.

“Thaus ntawd, kuv qha rua puab has tas, ‘Mej noog tej lug sis caav sis tshe ntawm cov pejxeem, mej yuavtsum txav txim kuas ncaaj thaus puab muaj kev sis caav sis tshe, tsi has mej tsaav tuabneeg lossis lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob.

Thaus mej txav txim, mej tsi xob xaiv ntsejmuag, mej yuavtsum txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua txhua tug, txawm yog nwg yuav yog leejtwg los xij. Mej tsi xob ntshai leejtwg le, rua qhov tej kws mej txav txim sab, yog lug ntawm Vaajtswv. Yog has tas muaj tej rooj plaub kws mej has tsi tau lawm, mej coj tuaj cuag kuv. Kuv maam le has rooj plaub ntawd.’
Tuab lub sijhawm ntawd, kuv qha txhua yaam kws mej yuav tau ua rua mej.

“Peb ua txhua yaam lawv le tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv has kuas peb ua. Peb tawm ntawm Roob Xinais moog hlaa lub taj suabpuam kws dlaav hab txaus ntshai, moog rua lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Amaules. Thaus peb lug txug rua huv Kades Npane-as,

kuv has rua mej tas, ‘Nwgnuav mej lug txug rua ntawm lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Amaules kws tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv hab yog peb cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv muab rua peb lawm. Mej tsaa muag saib lub tebchaws ntawd. Mej ca le moog nyob huv lawv le tug TSWV has rua mej lawm. Mej tsi xob ntaus sab yau lossis ntshai.’
“Tabsis mej tuaj cuag kuv hab has tas, ‘Ca peb tso ib paab txivneej moog soj lub tebchaws hab rov qaab lug qha rua peb, peb txhaj le paub kev moog, hab saib puab tej nroog zoo le caag.’
“Peb pum has tas qhov ntawd yog qhov kws zoo hab tsimnyog ua, kuv txhaj le xaiv tau kaum ob leeg txivneej, ib xeem ib leeg.
Puab taug lub laaj roob moog txug rua ntawm lub Haav Esekaus, hab soj thoob plawg lub haav ntawd.

Puab dle tau tej txiv maab txiv ntoo huv lub tebchaws ntawd coj lug qha rua peb, hab has rua peb tas, lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv muab rua peb ntawd, aav rog hab zoo qoobloo kawg le.
“Tabsis mej ntxeev sab hab tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug, hab tsi kaam moog rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd.

Mej ib leeg ywg rua ib leeg huv mej tej tsevntaub has tas, ‘Yog tug TSWV ntxub peb, nwg txhaj coj peb tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug hab muab peb cob rua cov tuabneeg Amaules, kuas puab muab peb tua tuag taag xwb!

Peb yuav moog rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd ua dlaabtsi? Peb ntshai kawg le. Thaus peb nov cov tuabneeg kws peb tso moog ntawd, rov lug qha rua peb has tas, cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, puab luj sab hab muaj zug tshaaj peb. Puab tej nroog muaj ntsaa yeej xov sab rua sau nruab ntug, hab puab pum cov tuabneeg ntawd luj kawg le.’
“Tabsis kuv has rua mej tas, ‘Tsi xob ntshai cov tuabneeg ntawd.
Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav coj mej kev moog hab nwg yuav paab kuas mej tua cov yeebncuab ntawd ib yaam le mej pum nwg ua nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv,
hab nraag taj suabpuam. Mej tub pum has tas, nwg coj mej taug kev kaaj sab lug lug txug rua ntawm nuav, ib yaam le leej txiv puag rawv nwg tug mivnyuas.’
Tabsis mej tsi noog tej lug kws kuv has, hab tsi ca sab rua tug TSWV,

txawm le ntawd los tug TSWV tseem moog ua mej ntej, nrhav chaw rua mej su. Nwg moog ua mej ntej coj mej txuj hauv kev, nwg ua tug nplaim tawg rua mej pum kev thaus tsaus ntuj, hab ua tauv fuab roog mej thaus nruab nub.
“Tug TSWV nov tej lug kws mej ywg lawm, nwg chim heev, nwg txhaj le coglug has tas,
‘Mej tam tuabneeg sab phem nuav yuav tsi muaj ib tug tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws kuv coglug tseg yuav muab rua mej cov yawmkoob le.
Tsuas yog Yefunes tug tub Kalej txhaj yuav tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd xwb. Nwg muab sab npuab kuv, hab kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws kws nwg moog soj ntawd rua nwg hab nwg cov xeebntxwv.’
Tub yog vim mej, tug TSWV txhaj chim rua kuv hab has tas, ‘Mauxes, koj yuav tsi tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
Tabsis koj yuav tau txhawb noos tug tub Yausuas zug, nwg yog tug paab koj, nwg yuav coj cov Yixalayees moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd.’

“Ces tug TSWV has rua peb suavdlawg tas, ‘Mej cov mivnyuas tseem yau kws tsi tau paub qhov phem qhov zoo, yog cov mivnyuas kws mej has tas yuav raug mej cov yeebncuab nteg, puab txhaj yog cov kws yuav tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Kuv yuav muab lub tebchaws ntawd rua puab, hab puab yuav tau moog nyob huv.
Tabsis mej cov ko, mej ca le tig rov qaab moog rua tom taj suabpuam kws yog txujkev rov moog rua Havtxwv Lab.’

“Mej teb has tas, ‘Mauxes, peb tau ua txhum rua tug TSWV lawm tag! Tabsis nwgnuav peb yuav moog tua hab txeeb lub tebchaws ntawd lawv le tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tau has rua peb lawm.’ Ces mej txhua tug txawm ca le npaaj moog ua rog, rua qhov mej xaav has tas, nce moog puav lub laaj roob ntawd yuav yoojyim heev.
“Tabsis tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj yuavtsum txwv tsi xob pub puab moog tua cov yeebncuab, rua qhov kuv tsi nrug puab, nyob tsaam puab cov yeebncuab tua yeej puab.’
Kuv has rua mej lawv le tug TSWV kuas kuv has, tabsis mej tsi tig qhovntsej noog le. Mej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV, hab vim mej khaavtheeb mej txhaj nce moog rua sau lub laaj roob lawm.
Cov Amaules kws nyob sau tej laaj roob tuaj tawmtsaam mej ib yaam le xub ntaab yaa tuaj. Puab caum mej tua lug ti nkaus rua ntawm Haumas hab puab tua yeej mej sau lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Edoos.
Mej txhaj le quaj thov tug TSWV paab, tabsis nwg tsi noog hab tsi quavntsej mej le.
Tom qaab kws mej nyob huv Kades Npane-as tau ib ntus ntev loo.
Peb txawm rov qaab moog rua taj suabpuam, taug kev moog rua Havtxwv Lab lawv le tug TSWV tau has lawm. Peb tau ncig moog ncig lug ntev loo ntawm lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Edoos.
“Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
mej tub ncig moog ncig lug ntawm tej laaj roob nuav tau ntev loo lawm, mej ca le moog rua saab qaumteb.
Nwg kuas kuv qha rua mej has tas, ‘Mej taabtom yuav moog rua ntawm lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Edoos, yog mej cov kwvtij kws yog Exaus cov xeebntxwv lub tebchaws, puab yuav ntshai mej heev,
tabsis mej tsi xob moog ua rog rua puab, kuv yuav tsi muab puab lub tebchaws ib thaaj aav luaj xibteg rua mej le. Kuv tub muab lub tebchaws Edoos ntawd rua Exaus cov xeebntxwv lawm.
Mej tsuas yuav tau mov noj hab dlej haus ntawm puab xwb.’

“Mej ncu ntsoov has tas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau foom koob moov rua txhua yaam kws mej ua taag lug lawm. Nwg tau tsomkwm mej thaus mej taug kev lug hlaa lub taj suabpuam kws dlaav heev, nwg nrug nraim mej tau plaub caug xyoo hab pub txhua yaam rua mej kuas muaj txaus.
“Peb txawm ncaim peb cov kwvtij kws yog Exaus cov xeebntxwv huv tebchaws Edoos, ntawm lub nroog Elas hab Exi-oosnkenpes taug txujkev Alanpas moog rua peg taj suabpuam Mau-am lawm.

Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Mej tsi xob moog thaab plaub nrug cov tuabneeg Mau-am lossis ua rog rua puab, rua qhov puab yog Lauj cov xeebntxwv. Kuv tub muab lub nroog Ales rua puab lawm, kuv yuav tsi muab lub tebchaws ntawd ib qho rua mej le.’ ”

(Muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg hu ua Emis, yog cov tuabneeg kws luj hab sab heev, puab ibtxwm nyob huv lub nroog Ales ntawd. Cov tuabneeg Emis luj hab sab ib yaam le cov tuabneeg Anakees kws yog ib tsaav tuabneeg luj hab sab heev.
Cov tuabneeg Emis muaj dlua ib lub npe hu ua Lefayees, ib yaam le cov tuabneeg Anakees; tabsis cov tuabneeg Mau-am hu cov tuabneeg ntawd ua Emis.

Thaus xubthawj cov tuabneeg Haulis nyob huv lub tebchaws Edoos, tabsis Exaus cov xeebntxwv muab puab lawv tawm, rhuav tshem puab tsaav tuabneeg hab lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws, ib yaam le cov Yixalayees muab puab cov yeebncuab lawv tawm huv puab lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua puab lawm.)
“Peb txhaj hlaa tug Dlej Zeles moog rua saab tim u lawv le tug TSWV tau has rua peb lawm.

Thaus peb tsiv huv Kades Npane-as lug txug thaus peb hlaa tug Dlej Zeles tau peb caug yim xyoo. Cov txivneej kws ua taug tubrog tam ntawd tuag taag lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm tas, puab yuav tuag taag le ntawd.
Tug TSWV tau tawmtsaam puab huv lub yeej kws puab nyob, ua rua puab puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.
“Tom qaab kws cov txivneej ntawd tuag taag lawm,
tug TSWV has rua kuv tas,
‘Nub nua mej hlaa kuas dlhau cheebtsaam Ales huv tebchaws Mau-am.

Mej tub moog yuav txug cov tuabneeg Amoos kws yog Lauj cov xeebntxwv lub tebchaws. Mej tsi xob thaab plaub lossis ua rog rua puab, rua qhov kuv yuav tsi muab lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab lawm, ib qho rua mej le.’ ”

(Cheebtsaam nuav lawv le suavdlawg paub, mas yog cov tuabneeg Lefayees lub tebchaws. Yog tsaav tuabneeg kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lub npe; cov tuabneeg Amoos hu cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd ua “Xaaxumis.”

Puab yog cov tuabneeg kws luj hab sab ib yaam le cov tuabneeg Anakees. Puab yog tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug hab coob heev. Tabsis tug TSWV muab puab rhuav puamtsuaj taag, yog le ntawd, cov Amoos txhaj moog txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws nyob.

Tug TSWV ua ib yaam le ntawd rua Exaus cov xeebntxwv kws yog tuabneeg Edoos kws nyob sau lub laaj roob huv tebchaws Edoos. Tug TSWV rhuav cov tuabneeg Haulis puamtsuaj taag. Yog le ntawd, cov Edoos txhaj moog txeeb tau lub tebchaws ntawd ua puab tug hab moog nyob rua huv. Puab tseem nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd lug txug naj nub nua.

Tabsis cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv koog Povtxwv Kaletes, lug nyob saab tebchaws kws lawv ntug Havtxwv Meditelanees. Puab lug tua cov tuabneeg Avimes kws ibtxwm nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd tuag taag. Hab txeeb tau taagnrho lub tebchaws ntawd moog ti nkaus rua lub nroog Nkaxas ua puab tug.)

“Thaus peb lug dlhau tebchaws Mau-am lawm, tug TSWV has rua peb tas, ‘Mej ca le hlaa tug Dlej Alenoos moog rua saab tim u. Kuv tub muab cov Amaules tug vaajntxwv Xihoos kws kaav lub nroog Hesenpoos, hab nwg lub tebchaws cob rua mej lawm. Mej ca le moog tua hab nyob huv nwg lub tebchaws.
Txij nub nua moog, kuv yuav ua kuas tej tuabneeg kws nyob txhua qhov ntshai mej. Txhua tug yuav ntshai tshee nyo thaus puab nov mej lub npe.’
“Kuv txhaj tso tuabneeg ntawm taj suabpuam Kedemaus moog cuag Vaajntxwv Xihoos kws nyob huv Hesenpoos, hab nrug nwg cog phoojywg le nuav:
‘Thov ca peb hlaa mej lub tebchaws moog, peb yuav taug kev ncaaj nraim xwb, tsi moog rua saab xis lossis saab txhumphem le.
Peb yuav them nqe rua cov dlej kws peb haus hab tej zaub mov kws peb noj. Peb tsuas thov koj tso kev rua peb hlaa koj lub tebchaws

moog txug thaus peb hlaa dlhau tug Dlej Yauladees rua tim lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv muab rua peb lawm, ib yaam le Exaus cov xeebntxwv kws nyob huv tebchaws Edoos hab cov Mau-am kws nyob huv lub nroog Ales, tau tso kev rua peb hlaa puab lub tebchaws lug lawm.’

“Tabsis Vaajntxwv Xihoos tsi pub peb hlaa huv nwg lub tebchaws moog le, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv ua rua nwg muaj lub sab tawv heev, kuas peb txhaj tua yeej nwg hab txeeb tau nwg lub tebchaws kws peb tseem nyob naj nub nua.
“Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Mej saib, kuv tub muab Xihoos hab nwg lub tebchaws cob rua mej lawm; ca le moog txeeb nwg lub tebchaws rua mej nyob.’
Vaajntxwv Xihoos hab nwg paab tubrog tuaj tua peb ze rua ntawm lub nroog Yahas.
Tabsis tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tub muab nwg cob rua peb lawm, peb txhaj tua tau nwg, nwg cov tub hab taagnrho nwg cov tubrog.
Thaus ntawd, peb txeeb tau nwg lub tebchaws, rhuav txhua lub nroog hab tua txhua tug tuabneeg, tsi has quaspuj, txivneej hab mivnyuas, peb tsi tseg ib tug muaj sa nyob le.
Peb coj puab tej tsaj txhu hab fuab puab tej khoom huv tej nroog moog taag.

Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv ca peb moog txeeb tau taagnrho cov nroog kws txij ndlua ntawm Alu-es kws nyob npuab lub Haav Alenoos, hab lub nroog kws nyob huv plawv lub haav ntawd, moog txug ntawm Nkile-as. Tsi muaj ib lub nroog twg muaj ntsaa yeej khov kws peb yuav tsoo tsi tau le.

Tabsis peb yeej tsi moog ze rua ntawm cheebtsaam kws cov Amoos nyob, lossis moog ze rua ntawm tug ntug dlej Yanpaus, lossis tej nroog kws nyob rua sau laaj roob, lossis txhua qhov chaw kws tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tsi pub peb moog.
“Dlhau ntawd, peb moog rua peg tebchaws Npasaas, Vaajntxwv Aunkas txawm coj nwg paab tubrog tuaj tua peb ze rua ntawm lub nroog Ediles.

Tabsis tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj tsi xob ntshai nwg. Kuv yuav muab nwg, nwg cov tubrog hab nwg lub tebchaws cob rua mej. Koj ca le ua rua Aunkas ib yaam le koj ua rua Xihoos kws yog cov Amaules tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub nroog Hesenpoos.’
“Yog le ntawd, tug TSWV txhaj muab Vaajntxwv Aunkas hab nwg cov pejxeem cob rua peb, hab peb muab puab tua tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Thaus ntawd peb moog txeeb tau nwg tej nroog taagnrho tsi tseg ib lub le. Taagnrho cov nroog kws peb txeeb tau huv cheebtsaam Alenkaus kws Vaajntxwv Aunkas kws nyob huv tebchaws Npasaas kaav muaj rau caum lub.
Taagnrho cov nroog ntawd puavleej muaj ntsaa yeej sab heev, tej roojvaag los muab laag hlau laag, hab ntau lub zog tsi muaj ntsaa yeej.
Peb rhuav txhua lub nroog puamtsuaj taag, hab tua cov quaspuj, txivneej hab mivnyuas tuag taag huv tuabsi, ib yaam le peb ua rua Vaajntxwv Xihoos huv lub nroog Hesenpoos lawm.
Peb coj puab tej tsaj txhu hab fuab puab tej khoom huv puab tej nroog moog taag.
“Thaus ntawd peb moog txeeb tau lub tebchaws kws cov Amaules ob tug vaajntxwv kaav ntawm tug dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj, txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Alenoos moog txug rua peg lub Roob Helemoos.
(Lub Roob Helemoos, cov tuabneeg Xidoos hu ua Roob Xili-oos, hab cov tuabneeg Amaules hu ua Roob Xeniles).

Peb txeeb tau taagnrho cheebtsaam kws Vaajntxwv Aunkas kaav huv tebchaws Npasaas: cov nroog kws nyob huv taj nraag cheebtsaam Nkile-as hab Npasaas, hab dlhau moog rua lub nroog Xalekas hab Ediles kws nyob saab nubtuaj.

(“Aunkas yog tug vaajntxwv kawg ntawm tsaav tuabneeg Lefayees. Nwg lub txaaj  yog muab hlau  ua, dlaav plaub tshim, hab ntev cuaj tshim, lawv le luas ibtxwm ntsuag. Naj nub nua lub txaaj ntawd tseem nyob huv cov tuabneeg Amoos lub nroog Lanpas.)

“Thaus peb txeeb tau lub tebchaws ntawd lug ua peb tug lawm, kuv muab cheebtsaam ntawm lub nroog Alu-es, saab qaumteb kws nyob ze tug dlej Alenoos lub laaj roob huv Nkile-as nrug tej nroog ib nraab faib rua xeem Lunpees hab xeem Khas.

Kuv muab cheebtsaam Nkile-as kws seem hab lub nroog Npasaas kws Aunkas kaav nrug rua cheebtsaam Alenkaus taagnrho faib rua xeem Manaxes ib nraab.” (Lawv le suavdlawg paub, Npasaas yog cov Lefayees lub tebchaws.

Yais kws yog xeem Manaxes tau taagnrho cheebtsaam Alenkaus kws yog Npasaas, moog txug ndlua ntawm cov Nkesus hab cov Ma-akas nrimteb. Yales muab nwg tej zog tis npe lawv le nwg lub npe, naj nub nwgnuav luas tseem hu ua Yais tej zog.)
“Kuv muab cheebtsaam Nkile-as faib rua Makhis cuab kwvtij kws yog xeem Manaxes.

Kuv muab cheebtsaam ntawm Nkile-as moog ti nkaus rua ntawm tug dlej Alenoos faib rua xeem Lunpees hab xeem Khas. Ob xeem ntawd tug nrimteb saab qaabteb phua plhawv tug dlej Alenoos, hab saab qaumteb tug nrim txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Yanpaus kws yog cov Amoos tug nrimteb.

Saab nubpoob tug nrim moog txug ndlua tug Dlej Yauladees, txij ndlua ntawm Havtxwv Kalilais kws nyob saab qaumteb moog txug rua nraag Havtxwv Tuag kws nyob saab qaabteb hab moog txug rua ntawm lub taw Roob Pinkas kws nyob saab nubtuaj.

“Thaus ntawd kuv has le nuav rua puab tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tub muab lub tebchaws kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj rua mej lawm. Mej ca le txhij mej cov tubrog hab kuas puab hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tim u, moog ua mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees ntej, hab paab puab tua lub tebchaws.
Kuv paub has tas mej muaj quaspuj mivnyuas hab muaj tsaj txhu coob. Yog le ntawd tsuas tseg mej cov quaspuj, mivnyuas hab tej tsaj txhu nyob huv cov nroog kws kuv tub muab faib rua mej lawm xwb.

Mej yuav tau moog paab mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees tua lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua puab kws nyob ntawm tug dlej Yauladees saab nubpoob, moog txug thaus tug TSWV pub rua puab nyob kaaj sab lug huv lub tebchaws ntawd ib yaam le tug TSWV tub pub rua mej lawm. Tom qaab ntawd mej maam le rov qaab lug nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej.’

“Ces kuv has rua Yausuas has tas, ‘Koj tub pum tej kws tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv ua rua Vaajntxwv Xihoos hab Vaajntxwv Aunkas lawm; nwg yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd rua txhua lub tebchaws kws koj moog tua.
Koj tsi xob ntshai puab, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog koj tug Vaajtswv yuav paab kuas koj tua yeej.’
“Thaus ntawd kuv thov Vaajtswv has tas,

‘Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, koj tub qha tej txujci tseemceeb kws koj yuav ua rua kuv paub thaus chivkeeb lug lawm, yeej tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv kws nyob sau ntuj lossis huv nplajteb nuav yuav muaj cuabkaav ua tej txujci tseemceeb npaum le koj tau ua taag lug lawm!
Tug TSWV, thov pub kuv hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tim u, kuas kuv tau pum lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob, tej laaj roob kws zoo nkauj hab tej roob sab huv tebchaws Lenpanoos.’

“Tabsis tub yog vim mej ntaag, tug TSWV txhaj le chim rua kuv, hab tsi noog kuv tej lug thov. Nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj lug txug ntawm nuav xwb ces tau lawm! Tsi xob has qhov kws koj yuav moog rua tebchaws Kana-aas le!

Koj ca le nce moog rua sau lub ncov Roob Pinkas hab tsaa muag saib saab qaumteb, saab qaabteb, saab nubtuaj hab saab nubpoob. Koj ua tuab zoo saib tej kws koj qhovmuag pum, rua qhov koj yuav tsi tau hlaa tug dlej Yauladees.
Koj yuavtsum qha Yausuas hab txhawb nwg tug zug, kuas nwg muaj lub sab tawv, rua qhov nwg yog tug kws yuav coj kuv tsaav tuabneeg hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog nyob lub tebchaws kws koj pum ntawd.’
“Yog le ntawd, peb tseem nyob huv lub haav kws saib ntsoov lub nroog Npepe-aus.”

Ces Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej yuavtsum coj lawv le tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej, mej txhaj muaj sa nyob ntev, hab kaav lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv muab pub rua mej.

Mej tsi xob ntxiv ib lu lug rua tej lug kws kuv has tseg rua mej lossis rhu ib lu lug tseg le. Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws kuv has rua mej txhua lu huv tuabsi.
Mej puavleej pum tej kws tug TSWV ua sau Roob Pe-aus lawm. Tug TSWV tua cov tuabneeg kws pe tug mlom Npa-aas txhua tug povtseg huv tuabsi,
tabsis mej cov kws muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej suavdlawg puavleej tseem ua neej nyob lug txug naj nub nua.

“Kuv tub qha tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai kws nwg kuas kuv qha rua mej taag lawm, thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog tua, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej kevcai ntawd.

Mej yuavtsum muab sab npuab hab ua lawv le tej kevcai nuav, luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg txhaj pum has tas, mej muaj tswvyim. Thaus luas nov txug tej kevcai nuav, luas yuav has nchaa lug tas, ‘Tsaav tuabneeg nuav muaj tswvyim hab txawj ntse kawg le!’

“Tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg kws muaj tug tswv nrug puab nyob hab paab puab ib yaam le tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv, nrug peb hab paab peb, txawm yog tsaav tuabneeg ntawd muaj fwjchim luj npaum twg los xij, yeej tsi muaj ib tug kws yuav paab puab le. Tabsis thaus twg peb tsaa ncauj thov tug TSWV, nwg yeej paab peb.
Tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb twg kws muaj tej kevcai ncaaj nceeg le tej kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej.
Mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj hab ncu ntsoov tej kws mej qhovmuag pum nuav moog taag mej simneej. Mej yuavtsum muab pav qha rua mej tej tubki hab tej xeebntxwv noog

txug tej xwm kws nub mej moog cuag tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv sau lub Roob Xinais.  Nub ntawd nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj ca le hu cov pejxeem tuaj ua ke, kuv xaav qha kuv tej lug rua puab noog, kuas puab txhaj paub fwm hab noog kuv lug moog taag puab tam neej hab puab txhaj paub qha puab tej tubki kuas noog kuv tej lug.’
“Mej yuavtsum pav qha rua mej tej mivnyuas noog has tas, nub ntawd mej moog sawv ntawm taw roob, muaj fuab tsaus nti le paa tawg hab muaj nplaim tawg cig nto ntuj.
Mej qha rua puab has tas, tug TSWV has lug huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj rua mej. Nwg has le caag rua mej los mej yeej nov txhua lu, tabsis mej tsi pum nwg.

Nwg qha tej kws mej yuavtsum tau ua rua mej, mej txhaj yuav coj tau lawv le tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua mej lawm. Nwg has kuas mej ua lawv le Kaum Nqai Kevcai kws nwg tau sau rua ntawm ob dlaim txag zeb.
Tug TSWV kuas kuv qha nwg tej kevcai rua mej paub hab mej yuavtsum coj, thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom moog tua ntawd.
“Thaus tug TSWV has lug huv cov nplaim tawg kws nyob sau Roob Xinais tuaj rua mej, mej tsi pum nwg. Yog mej xaav tau zoo, mej yuavtsum ceevfaaj
tsi xob puab ib tug mlom dlaabtsi hlo le, tsi has zoo le quaspuj lossis zoo le txivneej,
tsi has zoo le tug tsaj lossis zoo le tug noog,
tsi has zoo le tug naab lossis zoo le tug ntseg. Yog mej puab tej ntawd, ces mej ua txhum ntaag.
Mej tsi xob teev lossis pe tej kws mej pum nyob sau nruab ntug, tsi has lub nub lossis lub hli hab tej nubqub. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg pe tej ntawd.
Tabsis Vaajtswv coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws zoo le lub cubtawg lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, ib yaam le naj nub nua mej yog nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv chim rua kuv, tub yog vim mej ntaag, tug TSWV txhaj has tas, nwg tsi pub kuv hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog nyob tim lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws nwg taabtom muab pub rua mej.
Kuv yuav tuag rua huv lub tebchaws nuav, kuv yuav tsi tau hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tid, tabsis mej yuav tau hlaa moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob ntawd.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua mej lawm. Mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV tej lug kws qha rua mej has tas, ‘Tsi xob puab ib yaam mlom dlaabtsi rua mej pehawm hlo le,’
rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv khib mej heev. Nwg zoo ib yaam le tej nplaim tawg kws cig laim lag.

“Txawm yog mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd tau ntev, hab muaj tub muaj ki, muaj xeebntxwv lawm los mej tsi xob puab ib yaam mlom dlaabtsi le. Yog mej puab mlom, ces mej ua txhum lawm ntaag. Qhov kws tuabneeg puab mlom yog kev txhum kws ua rua tug TSWV chim.

Nub nua kuv thov lub ntuj hab lub teb nrug kuv ua timkhawv, yog mej tsi noog kuv lug, tsi ntev mej yuav puamtsuaj taag rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Mej yuav tsi tau nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog nyob ntawd. Mej yuav puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV yuav ua rua mej tawg ua saab ua sua moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg nyob, mej cov tuabneeg tsuas tshuav cov tsawg txhaj dlim kev puamtsuaj hab muaj sa ua neej nyob xwb.

Mej yuav tau teev luas tej mlom huv tej tebchaws kws mej moog nyob ntawd, tsi has tej mlom kws yog ntoo lossis pobzeb. Tej mlom ntawd yeej tsi nov lug hab tsi pum kev, tsi txawj noj hab tsi nov ntxhab dlaabtsi le.
Thaus mej moog nyob huv luas tej tebchaws, yog mej muab sab rau nrhav tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tag, mej yeej yuav ntsib nwg.
Thaus tej xwm nuav lug raug mej hab mej raug kev txomnyem ntxhuv sab, thaus ntawd mej yuav tig rov lug cuag tug TSWV hab noog nwg lug.
Nwg yog tug Vaajtswv kws muaj kev taabncuab, nwg yuav tsi tso mej tseg lossis ua rua mej puamtsuaj, nwg yuav ncu ntsoov tej lug kws thaus u nwg tau cog tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm.

“Mej sim moog nug saib tam thaus u kws tseem tsi tau yug mej, suav txij thaus Vaajtswv tsim muaj tuabneeg nyob rua lub nplajteb nuav lug puas muaj tej xwm luj npaum le tej kws mej pum nuav los tsi muaj? Mej sim moog nug thoob nplajteb saib, puas muaj leejtwg nov tej xwm zoo le nuav los tsi nov?
Puas muaj leejtwg nov Vaajtswv has lug huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj, hab nwg tseem caj sa nyob ib yaam le thaus mej nov Vaajtswv has, mej tseem muaj sa nyob?

Puas muaj ib tug Vaajtswv twg muaj cuabkaav coj tau ib tsaav tuabneeg tawm huv lwm tsaav tuabneeg lub tebchaws lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug? Tub yog Vaajtswv lub fwjchim hab nwg tug zug, ua siv ua npug, ua tsuv ua rog, ua tej txujci tseemceeb kws luj kawg nkaus, hab ua tej xwmtxheej kws tuabneeg ntshai taabmeeg rua mej qhovmuag pum ntaag.
Tug TSWV ua tej nuav qha rua mej paub has tas, nwg tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv, tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv.

Tug TSWV ua rua mej nov nwg lub suab has sau ntuj tuaj, nwg txhaj qha tau mej, hab ca mej pum nwg tej nplaim tawg kws tseemceeb huv nplajteb nuav. Mej nov nwg lub suab has lug huv tej nplaim tawg ntawd tuaj.
Nwg hlub mej cov yawmkoob, nwg txhaj xaiv mej hab nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.

Thaus mej txaav quas zug moog rua tom hauv ntej, tug TSWV ntab tej tsaav tuabneeg kws luj hab muaj zug dlua mej tsiv tawm ua ntej mej moog txug, nwg ua le ntawd tub yog nwg coj mej moog nyob huv puab lub tebchaws kws nwg muab pub rua mej nyob ua mej tug lawm.

Yog le ntawd, nub nua mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov rua nruab sab has tas, tug TSWV kws yog Vaajtswv, nwg kaav sau ntuj hab huv nplajteb. Tsi muaj dlua lwm tug Vaajtswv nyob qhov twg le, tsuas yog muaj nwg tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv.

Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej txhua nqai. Mej hab mej tej tubki txhaj yuav noj qaab nyob zoo. Mej yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav muab rua mej ua mej tug moog ibtxhis.”
Mauxes xaiv tau peb lub nroog kws nyob saab nubtuaj ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees
tseg rua tug kws yuam kev tua tug tuabneeg kws tsi yog nwg tug yeebncuab, tau tsiv moog cawm sav. Nwg tsiv moog nyob huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub, kuas luas tsi xob muab nwg tua.

Xeem Lunpees tau lub nroog Npexeles kws nyob ntawm taj suabpuam; xeem Khas tau lub nroog Lamaus kws nyob huv cheebtsaam Nkile-as; hab xeem Manaxes tau lub nroog Nkaulaas kws nyob huv cheebtsaam Npasaas.
Mauxes qha Vaajtswv tej kevcai rua cov Yixalayees.

Mauxes muab tug TSWV tej kevcai nuav qha rua puab, tom qaab kws puab tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug nyob rua huv lub haav ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj kws saib ntsoov lub nroog Npepe-aus. Lub haav ntawd nyob huv cov Amaules tug Vaajntxwv Xihoos kws kaav lub nroog Hesenpoos lub tebchaws. Thaus Mauxes hab cov Yixalayees tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, puab tua yeej Vaajntxwv Xihoos.
Puab kaav taagnrho Vaajntxwv Xihoos lub tebchaws, hab Vaajntxwv Aunkas lub tebchaws kws yog cheebtsaam Npasaas; Aunkas yog cov Amaules tug vaajntxwv kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj.
Lub tebchaws nuav tug nrim txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Alu-es kws nyob ntawm ntug Dlej Alenoos moog rua saab qaumteb ti nkaus lub nroog Xili-oos  kws yog lub Roob Helemoos.
Hab taagnrho cheebtsaam kws nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubtuaj, hab moog ti nkaus rua nraag Havtxwv Tuag kws nyob saab qaabteb hab moog txug ndlua ntawm taw roob Pinkas kws nyob saab nubtuaj.
Mauxes hu taagnrho cov Yixalayees tuaj ua ke hab has rua puab tas, “Cov Yixalayees, mej ca le noog tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, kuas mej paub coj hab ua lawv le tej kevcai ntawd.
Thaus peb tseem nyob ntawm Roob Xinais, tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg rua peb.
Tsi yog rua peb cov yawmkoob xwb, tabsis yog rua peb cov kws tseem muaj sa nyob naj nub nua ntaag.
Thaus nyob sau Roob Xinais, tug TSWV has rua mej tim ntsej tim muag huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj.

Thaus ntawd, kuv sawv nruab nraab ntawm mej hab tug TSWV, hab qha tej lug kws nwg kuas kuv qha rua mej, vim mej ntshai tej nplaim tawg ntawd heev, mej txhaj tsi kaam nce moog rua sau roob. “Tug TSWV has tas,
‘Kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, tug kws coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws mej ua luas qhev lug.
“ ‘Tsi xob pe lwm tug vaajtswv, tabsis pehawm kuv tuab leeg xwb.
“ ‘Tsi xob puab tej mlom kws zoo le tej kws nyob sau nruab ntug lossis tej kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav lossis huv tivtxwv rua mej pe.

Tsi xob pe ib tug mlom twg le, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv khib mej heev. Kuv yog tug TSWV kws rau txim rua cov kws ntxub kuv, hab puab cov xeebntxwv moog txug peb hab plaub tam tuabneeg.
Tabsis kuv hlub cov kws muab sab npuab kuv hab coj lawv le kuv tej kevcai, ib tam dlhau ib tam moog txug ntau txheeb tam tuabneeg.
“ ‘Tsi xob muab kuv lub npe moog has ua dlog ua dlig, rua qhov kuv yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, kuv yuav rau txim rua cov tuabneeg kws muab kuv lub npe moog has ua dlog ua dlig.
“ ‘Ncu ntsoov nub Xanpataus ua nub tseemceeb, lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv has rua mej lawm.
Ua mej tej num rau nub,

tabsis nub xyaa yog nub su hab pehawm Vaajtswv. Nub ntawd tsi pub leejtwg ua num le, tsi has mej, mej tej tub tej ntxhais, tej tubqhe, tej tsaj txhu, lossis lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws, suavdlawg yuavtsum su huv tuabsi, kuas mej cov tubqhe tau su ib yaam le mej.
Ncu ntsoov thaus mej ua luas qhev nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub fwjchim paab mej dlim. Tub yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj kuas mej fwm Nub Xanpataus.
“ ‘Yuavtsum fwm mej nam mej txiv, lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv has rua mej lawm, mej txhaj yuav noj qaab nyob zoo hab muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua mej.
“ ‘Tsi xob tua tuabneeg.
“ ‘Tsi xob ntxag luas quaspuj luas quasyawg.
“ ‘Tsi xob ua tubsaab.
“ ‘Mej tsi xob ua timkhawv tsi tseeb ntxo kwvtij zej zog.
“ ‘Tsi xob ntshaw luas quaspuj, tsi xob ntshaw luas tej vaaj tse, luas tej laj teb, luas tej tubqhe, luas tej nyuj, luas tej neeg luav lossis tej kws yog luas tug.’

“Tej nuav yog tug TSWV tej kevcai kws nwg muab rua mej thaus mej tuaj txoos ua ke rua ntawm Roob Xinais, thaus kws tug TSWV has lug ua suab nrov ntxhe ntxhas huv cov nplaim tawg hab huv tauv fuab kws tsaus nti tuaj, nwg tsi muab lwm yaam rua mej, tsuas yog tej kevcai nuav xwb. Nwg sau rua ntawm ob dlaim txag zeb hab muab rua kuv.
“Thaus cov nplaim tawg cig thoob plawg sau lub roob ntawd, mej nov ib lub suab has huv qhov kws tsaus nti tuaj, ces mej cov thawjcoj hab cov thawj ntawm tej xeem lug cuag kuv

hab has rua kuv tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv qha nwg lub fwjchim hab nwg tug fwvxyeej rua peb, thaus peb nov nwg lub suab has huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj. Nub nua peb pum Vaajtswv has lug rua ib tug tuabneeg, txawm le ntawd los nwg tseem muaj sa nyob.
Yog peb tseem nov tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv lub suab has lug ntxiv, mas peb yeej yuav tuag; hab cov nplaim tawg yeej yuav kub peb xwb. Peb tsi tau xaav tuag le.
Puas muaj leejtwg nov Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob lub suab has lug huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj hab tug ntawd tseem muaj sa nyob?

Mauxes, thov koj rov qaab moog sau roob, hab noog tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tej lug saib nwg has le caag rua koj. Koj maam rov lug qha tej lug ntawd rua peb. Peb yuav noog hab ua lawv le tej lug ntawd.’
“Thaus tug TSWV nov mej tej lug, nwg has rua kuv tas, ‘Kuv tub nov tej lug kws cov tuabneeg ntawd has, puab has yog lawm.
Yog puab txawj xaav le ntawd, hab noog kuv tej lug moog le, mas puab hab puab tej xeebntxwv yuav tau lub neej zoo moog taag simneej.
Koj ca le rov qaab moog has kuas puab rov moog rua huv puab tej tsevntaub.

Tabsis Mauxes, koj rov tuaj cuag kuv ntawm nuav. Kuv yuav qha kuv tej kevcai huv tuabsi rua koj. Koj coj moog qha rua puab, kuas puab coj lawv le ntawd, thaus puab moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua puab.’
“Cov Yixalayees, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai kws nwg qha rua mej lawm. Mej yuavtsum coj lawv le Vaajtswv tej kevcai txhua nqai.
Noog hab ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai txhua nqai, mej txhaj yuav noj qaab nyob zoo hab ua neej nyob ntev rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej yuav moog tua ntawd.

“Tej lug nuav yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai kws nwg kuas kuv muab qha rua mej. Thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog tua hab nyob ntawd, mej yuavtsum coj lawv le tej kevcai nuav.

Mej hab mej tej xeebntxwv yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv moog txug nub kws taag mej simneej. Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV tej kevcai kws kuv qha rua mej txhua nqai, mej txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws ntawd.

Ib tsoom Yixalayees, mej ca le noog hab khaws coj, mej txhaj yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug hab caj ua ib tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim luj nyob huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob, lawv le tug TSWV kws yog peb cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg lawm.
“Ib tsoom Yixalayees, mej ua tuab zoo noog, tsuas yog tug TSWV tuab leeg xwb, txhaj yog peb tug Vaajtswv.
Mej yuavtsum hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kawg sab kawg ntsws, kawg plaab kawg plawv hab kawg mej tug dlaag tug zug.
Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej!
Mej yuavtsum muab qha rua mej tej mivnyuas, hab naj nub has txug tej lug ntawd, tsi has thaus mej nyob huv tsev, thaus mej taug kev, thaus mej su hab thaus mej ua num.
Muab paav rua ntawm mej ncej npaab hab rua ntawm mej hauvplaj ua chaw ncu.
Muab sau rua ntawm mej tej ncej qhovrooj hab ntawm mej tej roojvaag.

“Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav muab lub tebchaws vaammeej, muaj zej muaj zog kws tsi yog mej txhais teg ua rua mej nyob ua mej tug, lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj kws yog mej cov yawmkoob lawm.

Tej vaaj tse ntawd muaj txhua yaam zoo puv nkaus kws tsi yog mej npaaj ca rua huv, hab muaj tej qhov tshij kws tsi yog mej khawb, muaj tej vaaj txiv maab hab tej vaaj txiv ntoo roj kws tsi yog mej cog. Thaus kws tug TSWV coj mej lug nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, mej muaj txhua yaam noj nplua mag,
Mej Yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, tug TSWV tau coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws mej ua luas qhev lug.
Mej yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, pehawm nwg tuab leeg hab tuav nwg lub npe coglug xwb.
Mej tsi xob pe lwm tug vaajtswv lossis teev cov tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig mej tej vaajtswv le.
Yog mej tseem moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv, tug TSWV yuav chim rua mej hab ua kuas mej puamtsuaj ib yaam le suavtawg kub, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, nwg nrug mej nyob hab khib mej heev.
“Mej tsi xob sim tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv sab, ib yaam le mej sim nwg sab nyob nraag tebchaws Maxas.
Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov ua lawv le tej kevcai kws tug TSWV tub qha rua mej lawm.

Mej yuavtsum ua tej kws tug TSWV has tas zoo hab ncaaj nceeg, mej txhaj yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Mej txhaj yuav tau moog nyob lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws tug TSWV tau coglug tseg yuav muab rua mej cov yawmkoob,
hab mej txhaj yuav lawv tau mej cov yeebncuab tsiv tawm moog, lawv le tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua mej lawm.
“Lwm nub mej tej tubki yuav nug mej has tas, ‘Vim le caag tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv has kuas peb ua lawv le tej kevcai nuav?’
Ces mej qha rua puab has tas, ‘Peb ua Falaus qhev nyob huv tebchaws Iziv mas tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus paab peb dlim.
Peb qhovmuag pum nwg tej txujci tseemceeb hab tej xwm kws nwg ua rua cov Iziv, rua Falaus, Falaus tsev tuabneeg hab nwg cov numtswv ntshai kawg nkaus.
Tug TSWV cawm peb dlim ntawm cov Iziv txhais teg, nwg txhaj coj peb lug nyob rua huv lub tebchaws kws nwg muab pub rua peb, lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm.
Tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv has kuas peb ua lawv le tej kevcai nuav txhua nqai hab kuas peb fwm nwg. Yog peb ua lawv le nwg has, nwg yuav tsomkwm peb tsaav tuabneeg hab pub kuas peb vaammeej.
Yog peb ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug txhua lu, nwg yuav txaus sab rua peb.’

“Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog tua, hab nwg yuav ntab ntau tsaav tuabneeg tsiv tawm moog. Thaus mej moog tua, nwg yuav ntab xyaa tsaav tuabneeg kws luj hab muaj zug tshaaj mej tsiv tawm moog, cov tuabneeg ntawd yog cov Hitis, cov Nkinkasis, cov Amaules, cov Kana-aas, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus.

Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab tej tsaav tuabneeg ntawd, cob rua mej teg hab mej tua yeej puab lawm, mej yuavtsum tua puab kuas tu noob nrho, mej tsi xob nrug puab sis raug zoo lossis taabncuab puab hlo le.
Mej tsi xob moog yuav puab tej ntxhais lug rua mej tej tub, hab tsi xob ca mej tej ntxhais moog yuav puab tej tub,
rua qhov puab yuav ua rua mej tej tub tej ntxhais tso tug TSWV tseg hab moog pe luas tej vaajtswv. Yog mej ua le ntawd, tug TSWV yuav chim rua mej hab yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj taamsim ntawd.
Mej ca le rhuav puab tej thaaj, tsoo puab tej ncej zeb dlaab, ntuv puab tej ncej Aselas, hab hlawv puab tej mlom huv tuabsi povtseg.

Mej yuavtsum ua le nuav, rua qhov mej yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg tau xaiv mej tawm ntawm txhua tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws nwg hlub heev.
“Tug TSWV hlub mej hab xaiv mej, tsi yog vim mej yog ib tsaav tuabneeg kws coob tshaaj lwm tsaav; qhov tseeb, mej yog ib tsaav tuabneeg kws tsawg kawg nkaus huv nplajteb nuav.

Tabsis nwg hlub mej hab nwg ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm. Tub yog vim le nuav, nwg txhaj siv nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus cawm mej hab tso mej dlim, mej txhaj tsi tau ua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv qhev lawm.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv hab nwg yog tug ncaaj nceeg. Nwg yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg, nwg hlub tug kws noog nwg lug hab muab sab npuab nwg moog txug ib txheeb tam tuabneeg,
tabsis nwg yuav rau txim rua cov kws ntxub nwg.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej kws kuv qha mej; hab coj lawv le tej kevcai txhua nqai kws nub nua kuv muab cob rua mej.

“Yog mej noog hab ua lawv le tej kevcai nuav, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg rua mej, nwg yuav hlub mej moog ibtxhis lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm.

Nwg yuav hlub hab foom koob moov rua mej, mej yuav fuamvaam muaj tubki coob. Nwg yuav foom koob moov rua mej tej laj teb, mej yuav muaj qoobloo ntau, muaj cawv txiv maab hab roj txiv ntoo. Nwg yuav foom koob moov rua mej, kuas muaj nyuj, muaj yaaj hab muaj tshis coob. Nwg yuav foom tej koob moov nuav rua mej, thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwg tau coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm has tas, nwg yuav muab rua mej.
Tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav, tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg kws yuav tau koob moov npaum le mej. Mej tej quaspuj hab tej tsaj txhu tsi muaj ib tug mooj kws muaj tsi taug mivnyuas le.

Tug TSWV yuav tsomkwm tsi pub kuas mej muaj mob muaj nkeeg hab nwg yuav tsi tso tej mob phem kws mej pum nraag tebchaws Iziv lug raug mej le, tabsis nwg yuav tso tej ntawd lug raug mej tej yeebncuab txhua tug.

Mej yuavtsum tua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab cob rua mej teg kuas puamtsuaj taag, mej tsi xob hlub puab hlo le. Mej tsi xob pe puab tej vaajtswv, yog mej pe mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj.
“Mej tsi xob xaav has tas, cov tuabneeg nuav coob dlua mej, mej yuav lawv tsi tau puab tsiv tawm.
Mej tsi xob ntshai puab, mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej xwm kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ua rua Falaus hab cov Iziv.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej sub tawg sub ntshaa kws mej qhovmuag pum, tej txujci tseemceeb hab tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub fwjchim hab tug zug luj zug nchaav kws tso mej dlim, mej txhaj tsi tau ua luas qhev. Tug TSWV yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nwgnuav mej ntshai heev ntawd kuas puamtsuaj taag ib yaam le nwg ua rua cov Iziv raug puamtsuaj lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav tso sub tawg sub ntshaa  lug rua tej tsaav tuabneeg ntawd, txawm yog cov kws tsiv moog nkaum los yuav raug puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.

Yog le ntawd, mej tsi xob ntshai tej tuabneeg ntawd. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav nrug nraim mej; nwg yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, tsimnyog suavdlawg fwm hab ntshai nwg.

Thaus mej moog tua puab, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav ntab puab tawm zuj zug moog. Mej tsi xob ua tuab zag tua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi. Yog mej ua le ntawd, yuav muaj tsaj nruab nraag coob heev tuaj txuv mej.
Tug TSWV yuav muab mej tej yeebncuab cob rua mej, nwg yuav ua kuas puab ceeb hab tawg tsiv moog txug nub kws puab raug kev puamtsuaj taag.

Tug TSWV yuav muab puab tej vaajntxwv cob rua mej teg. Mej yuav tua tej vaajntxwv ntawd tuag taag, hab puab tej koob meej yuav pluj moog. Yeej tsi muaj leejtwg yuav tiv taug mej. Mej yuav tua puab tuag taag huv tuabsi.

Mej yuavtsum muab puab tej mlom hlawv povtseg. Mej tsi xob ntshaw tej nyaj tej kub kws luas muab vuam rua tej mlom ntawd. Hab mej tsi xob coj tej ntawd lug ua mej tug. Yog mej coj lug, mej yuav raug puamtsuaj, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ntxub tej mlom ntawd heev.

Mej tsi xob coj tej mlom ntawd ib tug lug tso rua huv mej tej tsev, nyob tsaam mej yuav raug foom tsi zoo ib yaam le tej mlom ntawd. Mej yuavtsum ntxub hab saib tej mlom ntawd tsi muaj nqes, rua qhov tug TSWV tub foom tsi zoo rua tej mlom ntawd lawm.

“Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej txhua nqai, mej txhaj muaj sa nyob ntev, muaj tubki coob hab tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv coj mej kev hlaa taj suabpuam tau plaub caug xyoo lug le caag, nwg ca mej raug kev txomnyem ntau yaam sim mej sab saib mej puas ua taug sab ntev, hab saib mej puas yuav ua lawv le nwg tej lug.

Nwg ca mej tshaib, nwg maam le muab cov manas kws mej hab mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau noj dlua rua mej noj. Nwg ua le ntawd, tub yog nwg qha kuas mej paub has tas, tsi yog mov xwb txhaj cawm tau tuabneeg txujsa, tabsis tug TSWV tej lug txhua lu txhaj cawm tau tuabneeg txujsa.
Lub sijhawm plaub caug xyoo ntawd mej tej tsoog tsho yeej tsi ndluag hab mej tej kutaw yeej tsi mob tsi o le.
Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv qhuab ntuag hab rau txim rua mej ib yaam le leej txiv qhuab ntuag nwg tej mivnyuas.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws qha rua mej has tas: mej yuavtsum ua lub neej lawv le tug TSWV tej kevcai hab fwm tug TSWV.

“Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv taabtom coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob, yog lub tebchaws kws muaj dlej, muaj qhovdlej txhawv, muaj dlej cag ndlwg laub lug huv tej kwj haa hab sau tej roob,
lub tebchaws ntawd luas cog nplej hab mog, cog txiv maab, txiv ncuav pas, txiv ntsab pobkws, txiv ntoo roj hab muaj zib ntaab ntau heev.
Thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, mej yuav tsi tshaib tsi nqhes hab tsi pluag le. Lub tebchaws ntawd tej roob zeb roob tsuas muaj qhov tooj qhov hlau.
Mej yuav muaj txaus noj txaus haus. Mej yuav ua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsaug, vim nwg muab lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob rua mej.
“Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv; mej yuavtsum ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv muab cob rua mej.
Thaus mej muaj noj muaj haus txaus, hab ua tau vaaj tau tsev rua mej nyob,
muaj nyuj, muaj yaaj, muaj nyaj muaj kub hab ib puas tsaav yaam ntau zuj zug tuaj,
mej yuavtsum tsi xob khaavtheeb hab tso tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv qhov chaw kws mej ua luas qhev lug tseg.

“Nwg coj mej lug hlaa taj suabpuam kws yog taj tuag tshaib tuag nqhes, muaj tej naab muaj taug hab raubris teb. Thaus mej tseem nyob nraag taj suabpuam kws qhuav nkig nkuav hab tsi muaj dlej haus, nwg ua dlej tawm huv pobzeb lug rua mej haus.
Tug TSWV muab cov manas kws mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau noj dlua rua mej noj nraag taj suabpuam. Tug TSWV tso ntau yaam kev txomnyem lug sim mej sab, thaus kawg nwg txhaj pub yaam kws zoo rua mej.
Mej tsi xob xaav has tas, yog mej tug dlaag tug zug hab mej lub tswvyim khwv mej txhaj muaj txag npluanuj.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, yog tug pub rua mej npluanuj. Nwg ua le ntawd, yog nwg ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg cog tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob hab nwg tseem ua zoo rua mej le ntawd lug txug naj nub nua.
Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej tsi xob tso nwg tseg hab moog pe luas tej vaajtswv. Nub nua kuv ntuag mej has tas, yog mej tsi noog lug mej yuav raug puamtsuaj xwb.
Yog mej tsi noog tug TSWV lug, mej yuav raug puamtsuaj ib yaam le txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws tug TSWV yuav ua kuas puab raug puamtsuaj thaus mej moog txeeb puab lub tebchaws.

“Ib tsoom Yixalayees, mej ua tuab zoo noog! Nub nuav mej taabtom yuav hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog tua lub tebchaws kws muaj cov tuabneeg luj hab muaj zug dlua mej. Puab tej nroog luj hab muaj ntsaa yeej xov sab rua sau ntuj.
Cov tuabneeg ntawd sab hab muaj zug heev. Puab luj tshaaj lwm tsaav tuabneeg huv tuabsi, hab mej tub nov moo lawm has tas, tsi muaj leejtwg tawmtsaam yeej puab le.

Tabsis nwgnuav mej yuav pum has tas, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav moog ua mej ntej ib yaam le cov nplaim tawg cig laam lug. Thaus mej moog nas tsaam, tug TSWV yuav ua kuas puab swb. Mej yuav lawv tau puab tsiv hab ua kuas puab puamtsuaj taag sai, lawv le tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua mej lawm.

“Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ntab puab tsiv taag lawm, mej tsi xob xaav has tas, qhov kws tug TSWV coj mej lug nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav, vim mej yeej tsimnyog lug nyob. Tsi yog le ntawd, tug TSWV ntab cov tuabneeg ntawd tsiv, tub yog vim puab ua kev phem kev qas.

Tsi yog vim mej coj ncaaj hab ua zoo, tug TSWV txhaj coj mej lug nyob huv puab lub tebchaws. Tug TSWV ntab puab tsiv vim puab ua kev phem kev qas. Hab tug TSWV yeej ua lawv le nwg coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob, Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj lawm.
Mej yuavtsum paub has tas, qhov kws tug TSWV muab lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob rua mej, tsi yog vim mej tsimnyog nyob, tsi yog le ntawd. Mej yeej yog cov tuabneeg kws tawv ncauj.

“Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, thaus mej tseem nyob nraag taj suabpuam, mej tau ua rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv chim heev npaum le caag. Suav txij nub kws mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug txug ntawm nuav, mej tseem pheej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV.
Thaus mej tseem nyob ntawm Roob Xinais, mej ua rua tug TSWV chim heev, nwg tub yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj.

Kuv nce moog nqaa ob dlaim txag zeb kws tug TSWV sau nwg tej lug cog tseg sau roob, yog tej lug kws nwg muab cob rua mej. Kuv moog nyob sau tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo tsi noj tsi haus ib yaam dlaabtsi le.
Tug TSWV muab ob dlaim txag zeb rua kuv, nwg muab nwg txhais teg sau tej lug kws nwg has huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj rua mej, yog nub kws mej suavdlawg tuaj ua ke rua ntawm Roob Xinais.
Thaus dlhau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo lawm, tug TSWV muab ob dlaim txag zeb kws nwg sau nwg tej lug cog tseg rua kuv.

“Tom qaab ntawd, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj ca le nqeg sau Roob Xinais nuav moog, rua qhov cov tuabneeg kws koj coj tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, tub ntxeev sab ua phem ua qas lawm. Puab tso tej kevcai kws kuv qha kuas puab ua tseg, hab puab nchuav tau ib tug mlom rua puab pe.’
“Tug TSWV has ntxiv rua kuv tas, ‘Kuv paub cov tuabneeg nuav tawv ncauj heev.

Tsi xob cheem kuv, kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj moog, kuas tsi muaj leejtwg nov puab moo ntxiv le lawm. Tom qaab ntawd kuv yuav tsaa koj caajceg ua ib tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim hab coob dlua puab.’
“Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj nqaa ob dlaim txag zeb kws sau Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg nqeg sau roob lug. Thaus ntawd muaj nplaim tawg cig lab ploog sau roob.
Kuv pum mej tso tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws nwg qha rua mej tseg sai kawg le, hab mej ua txhum rua tug TSWV, rua qhov mej muab kub nchuav ua ib tug mlom nyuj rua mej pe.
Kuv txhaj muab ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd ntsawm tawg mog nyoos taabmeeg mej.

Kuv txawm rov txhus caug ndlua khoov ua ntsejmuag ti nkaus aav hab thov tug TSWV tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo, kuv tsi noj tsi haus ib yaam dlaabtsi le. Kuv ua le nuav, tub yog vim mej ua txhum rua tug TSWV hab ua rua nwg chim.
Kuv ntshai tug TSWV txujkev chim, rua qhov nwg chim heev; nwg tub yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj, tabsis tug TSWV tseem noog kuv tej lug thov dlua ib zag hab.
Thaus ntawd, tug TSWV chim rua Aloos heev. Nwg tub yuav laug muab Aloos tua povtseg, kuv txhaj thov tug TSWV zaam txim rua Aloos.
Kuv muab mej txujkev txhum kws yog tug mlom nyuj kws mej nchuav pov rua huv cubtawg, kuv muab tsoo ua moov nphoo rua huv tug dlej kws ndlwg sau roob lug.
“Thaus mej tseem nyob nraag Tanpelas, Maxas hab Kilaus-Hatavas, mej tau ua rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv chim heev.
Hab thaus kws tug TSWV khaiv mej tawm huv Kades Npane-as moog tua lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV yuav muab rua mej, mej ntxeev sab rua nwg; mej tsi ca sab hab tsi noog nwg lug.
Kuv paub mej txij thaus ntawd lug, mej pheej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV tsi tseg le.
“Kuv khoov ti nkaus rua huv aav, thov tug TSWV tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo, rua qhov tug TSWV tub ua ib sab lawm has tas, nwg yuav ua kuas mej puamtsuaj taag.

Kuv thov tug TSWV has tas, ‘Tug TSWV kws kaav ib puas tsaav yaam, thov koj tsi xob ua rua koj tsaav tuabneeg puamtsuaj. Puab yog cov tuabneeg kws koj tug zug hab lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus cawm hab coj nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Thov koj ncu ntsoov Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj kws yog koj cov tubkhai. Thov koj tsi xob xaav txug cov tuabneeg nuav tej kev tawv ncauj, kev phem hab kev txhum.

Nyob tsaam cov Iziv yuav has tas, koj coj tsi tau koj tsaav tuabneeg moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws koj coglug tseg yuav muab rua puab nyob. Cov Iziv yuav has tas, koj ntxub koj tsaav tuabneeg, koj txhaj coj puab lug tua rua ntawm taj suabpuam nuav xwb.
Puab cov nuav yeej yog cov kws koj tau xaiv tseg ua koj tsaav tuabneeg, hab tub yog koj lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus coj puab tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.’

“Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Koj ca le txaug ob dlaim txag zeb zoo ib yaam le thawj ob dlaim, hab ua ib lub Phijxaab ntoo ntim ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd. Thaus ua tau tav lawm, koj ca le nqaa tuaj cuag kuv sau roob.
Kuv yuav rov sau tej lug kws kuv tub xub sau rua ob dlaim txag zeb kws koj muab ntsawm tawg taag lawm rua huv ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd. Koj maam le coj moog ntim ca rua huv lub Phijxaab Ntoo.’
“Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj muab ntoo kubtwg ua tau ib lub Phijxaab hab txaug tau ob dlaim txag zeb zoo ib yaam le thawj ob dlaim hab nqaa moog sau roob.

Tug TSWV rov sau cov lug kws nwg xub sau rua huv thawj ob dlaim txag zeb rua huv ob dlaim tshab ntawd. Tej lug ntawd yog Kaum Nqai Kevcai kws thaus mej moog ua ke ntawm lub roob hab tug TSWV has lug huv cov nplaim tawg tuaj rua mej. Tug TSWV muab ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd rua kuv.
Kuv txhaj nqeg sau roob lug, hab muab ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd ntim rua huv lub Phijxaab kws kuv ua lawv le tug TSWV has rua kuv. Ob dlaim txag zeb ntawd tseem nyob huv lub Phijxaab lug txug nwgnuav.
(“Cov Yixalayees tsiv tawm ntawm cov Ya-akaas tej qhov tshij lug nyob rua ntawm Mauxelas. Aloos tuag hab puab muab nwg log rua qhov ntawd. Aloos tug tub Ele-axas txhaj ua povthawj hloov Aloos chaw.
Tom qaab ntawd puab tsiv lug txug ntawm Nkunkaudas, puab maam le lug nyob rua huv Yaunpathas kws yog lub tebchaws muaj dlej ntau heev.

Thaus puab tseem nyob ntawm taw roob,  tug TSWV tau tsaa xeem Levis ua cov kwv lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg kws yog Kaum Nqai Kevcai hab tsaa puab ua cov povthawj kws ua tug TSWV teg num, hab ua cov tuav tug TSWV lub npe foom koob moov rua suavdlawg. Puab tseem ua le ntawd lug txug naj nub nua.
Yog le ntawd, xeem Levis txhaj tsi muaj feem nrug lwm xeem tau aav; tabsis puab tau ua tug TSWV teg num lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau coglug tseg lawm.)
“Kuv nyob sau roob tau plaub caug nub plaub caug mo ib yaam le thawj zag. Tug TSWV noog kuv tej lug thov dlua ib zag, nwg txhaj tsi ua rua mej puamtsuaj.
Nwg has kuas kuv ca le moog hab coj mej moog, mej txhaj tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwg tau coglug tseg yuav muab rua mej cov yawmkoob nyob.

“Ib tsoom Yixalayees, mej ca le ua tuab zoo noog saib tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv has kuas mej ua dlaabtsi: nwg xaav kuas mej fwm hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug txhua lu. Nwg kuas mej muab sab npuab hab ua nwg teg num kawg sab kawg ntsws,
hab coj lawv le nwg tej kevcai txhua nqai. Tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv muab cob rua mej, yuav muaj nqes rua mej.
Lub ntuj kws nyob sau yog tug TSWV tug, lub nplajteb hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws nyob huv los puavleej yog tug TSWV tug huv tuabsi.
Tug TSWV hlub mej cov yawmkoob heev, nwg txhaj xaiv mej lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg kws tseemceeb dlua lwm tsaav tuabneeg huv tuabsi, hab nwgnuav mej yog tsaav tuabneeg kws tug TSWV xaiv lawm.
Yog le ntawd, txij nuav moog mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV lug, hab tsi xob tawv ncauj lawm.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yog tug luj dlua tej vaajtswv hab ib puas tsaav yaam kws muaj fwjchim huv tuabsi. Nwg muaj fwjchim luj hab tseemceeb kawg nkaus, suavdlawg yuavtsum fwm hab paub ntshai nwg. Nwg tsi xaiv leejtwg ntsejmuag hab tsi yuav leejtwg tej nyaj xab.
Nwg tsomkwm cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tej puj ntsuag tsi pub leejtwg ua phem rua puab; nwg hlub txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug peb nyob. Nwg pub puab muaj rig tsho naav hab muaj zaub mov noj.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum hlub lwm tsaav tuabneeg, rua qhov yaav taag lug kws mej nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, luas hu mej ua tuabneeg txawv tebchaws.
Mej yuavtsum fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab pehawm nwg tuab leeg xwb, mej yuavtsum muab sab npuab nwg hab tuav nwg lub npe coglug xwb.
Mej yuavtsum ua nwg tsaug rua qhov nwg yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Mej lub qhovmuag tub pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws nwg ua paab mej lawm.

Thaus u mej cov yawmkoob moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, puab tsuas muaj xyaa caum leej xwb, tabsis nwgnuav tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv pub rua mej fuamvaam coob ib yaam le tej nubqub sau nruab ntug lawm.
“Mej yuavtsum hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, hab naj nub ua lawv le nwg tej Kevcai.

Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej kws tug TSWV qhuab ntuag mej. Tub yog mej lub qhovmuag pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV ua, tsi yog mej tej mivnyuas pum. Mej pum tug TSWV lub fwvxyeej, nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus, nwg tug zug luj zug nchaav
hab nwg tej txujci tseemceeb. Mej pum tej kws tug TSWV rau txim rua Falaus kws yog cov Iziv tug vaajntxwv hab taagnrho nwg lub tebchaws.
Mej pum tug TSWV ua rua cov Iziv tej tubrog tuag taag rua huv Havtxwv Lab,  thaus puab caum mej qaab tuaj, tsi has puab cov neeg hab puab tej tsheb neeg los puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.
Mej paub has tas, thaus mej tseem nyob ntawm taj suabpuam ua ntej kws mej lug nyob ntawm nuav, tug TSWV tau paab mej npaum le caag.

Nyaj mej tseem ncu tau tej kws tug TSWV rau txim rua Eli-as kws yog xeem Lunpees ob tug tub, Dathaas hab Anpilaas obtug. Tug TSWV ua rua aav qheb hlo nqog kag obtug, obtug quaspuj mivnyuas, vaaj tse, tej tubqhe hab tej tsaj txhu huv tuabsi taabmeeg mej.
Mej lub qhovmuag tub pum tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV tau ua lawm.
“Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej lug kws nub nua kuv has rua mej txhua lu huv tuabsi, mej txhaj yuav tau hlaa dlej moog tua lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog nyob ntawd.
Mej txhaj muaj sa nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws tug TSWV tau coglug tseg yuav muab rua mej cov yawmkoob hab puab cov xeebntxwv.

Lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog nyob ntawd, zoo tsi thooj le lub tebchaws Iziv kws mej nyob lug lawm. Thaus mej nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, mej yuav tau khawb kwj tso dlej lug rua huv mej tej laj tej teb khwv kawg le, mej txhaj cog tau qoobloo.
Tabsis lub tebchaws kws mej yuav moog nyob ntawd, muaj roob muaj haav, muaj dlej muaj naag hab aav noo zaws.
Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, tu hab saib lub tebchaws ntawd taag naj taag xyoo.
“Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej lawm. Hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab ua nwg teg num kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws.
Yog mej ua le ntawd, nwg yuav tso naag lug rua mej lub tebchaws, tsi has lub caij nplooj ntoos zeeg hab lub caij nplooj ntoos hlaav, mej yuav muaj qoobloo, muaj cawv txiv maab, muaj roj txiv ntoo
hab muaj tshaav zaub rua mej tej tsaj noj. Mej yuav muaj zaub mov noj txaus sab txaus ntsws.
Mej tsi xob ca leejtwg ntxag tau mej tso tug TSWV tseg moog pe luas tej vaajtswv.

Yog mej ua le ntawd, tug TSWV yuav chim rua mej. Nwg yuav tsi tso naag lug rua mej lub tebchaws, aav yuav qhuav, qoobloo yuav tuaj tsi taug. Txawm yog lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua mej nyob ntawd, ibtxwm zoo qoob los yuav tsi zoo lawm. Mej moog nyob tsi ntev, ces mej yuav tuag taag.
“Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej lug nuav ca rua nruab sab, muab paav rua ntawm mej ncej npaab hab dlai rua ntawm mej hauvplaj, mej txhaj yuav ncu ntsoov.
Mej yuavtsum muab pav qha rua mej tej mivnyuas, hab naj nub has txug tej lug nuav, tsi has thaus mej nyob huv tsev hab thaus mej taug kev, thaus mej su hab thaus mej ua num.
Mej ca le muab tej lug nuav sau rua ntawm mej tej ncej qhovrooj hab ntawm tej roojvaag.

Mej hab mej tej tubki txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev rua huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau coglug yuav muab rua mej cov yawmkoob. Yog tseem muaj lub ntuj lub teb, ces mej yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav moog ibtxhis.
“Mej yuavtsum muab sab rau ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej: hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, ua lawv le nwg tej lug txhua lu huv tuabsi hab muab sab npuab nwg
tug TSWV txhaj le ntab txhua tsaav tuabneeg tsiv tawm ua ntej mej moog tua, mej yuav tau kaav lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws luj hab muaj zug dlua mej lub tebchaws.

Txhua thaaj aav kws mej txhais kutaw moog tsuj puavleej yog mej tug. Mej tug nrimteb saab qaabteb txij ndlua ntawm taj suabpuam moog ti nkaus peg Roob Lenpanoos kws nyob saab qaumteb, hab saab nubtuaj txij ndlua ntawm tug Dlej Efalates moog ti nkaus ntawm Havtxwv Meditelanees kws nyob saab nubpoob.

Lub tebchaws ntawd txhua qhov kws mej moog, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav ua kuas cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv ntshai mej, lawv le tug TSWV tub coglug tseg lawm, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg txwv tau mej le.
“Nub nua kuv yuav ca mej xaiv saib, mej yuav tej lug foom koob moov lossis yuav tej lug foom phem,
yog mej ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, mej yuav tau koob moov;
tabsis yog mej tsi ua le ntawd, mej tseem moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv kws mej tsi tau pe dlua le, ces mej yuav raug foom tsi zoo.
Thaus tug TSWV coj mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog nyob ntawd, mej yuavtsum qha tej lug foom koob moov sau lub Roob Nkelixees hab qha tej lug foom phem sau lub Roob Enpales.

(Ob lub roob nuav nyob ntawm tug Dlej Yauladees saab nubpoob huv tebchaws Kana-aas. Cov tuabneeg ntawd nyob huv lub taj nraag Yauladees saab nubpoob, tsi dleb ntawm tsob Ntoo Xeeb Maules kws ze lub nroog Nkilenkas.)
Mej taabtom yuav hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog tua hab nyob lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav muab rua mej. Thaus mej moog tua yeej hab nyob huv lawm,
mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej.
“Tej nuav yog tej kevcai kws mej yuav tau coj moog taag mej simneej nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le ntawd!

Thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, mej yuavtsum muab lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej chaw kws puab teev puab tej vaajtswv sau tej roob sab, tej pov roob hab huv tej qaab ntoo kws muaj nplooj ntxoov nyog, rhuav kuas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.

Ca le rhuav puab tej thaaj hab tsoo puab tej ncej zeb tseemceeb kuas tawg taag huv tuabsi. Hlawv puab tej mlom Aselas kuas kub nyab hab tsoo puab tej mlom kuas tawg ntsoog ntxawg. Puab txhaj tsi tau chaw teev puab tej vaajtswv lawm.
“Mej tsi xob pehawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ib yaam le cov tuabneeg ntawd pe puab tej vaajtswv xwb.
Tug TSWV xaiv ib thaaj chaw huv mej lub tebchaws lug ua qhov chaw rua suavdlawg tuaj cuag nwg hab pehawm nwg.

Mej yuavtsum coj mej tej khoom tuaj fij rua ntawm qhov chaw ntawd, tsi has mej tej khoom kws hlawv fij theej txhoj hab lwm yaam khoom fij, tej khoom fij sis raug zoo, tej ib feem kaum, tej khoom fij kws mej coglug rua tug TSWV, tej khoom fij kws mej txaus sab muab hab thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj hab mivnyuas yaaj.
Nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, mej hab mej tsev tuabneeg yuav tau noj hab haus txaus sab rua tej qoobloo kws tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej khwv tau lug, taabmeeg tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
“Thaus txug lub sijhawm ntawd, mej yuav tsi tau ua ywj sab ib yaam le mej tau ua yaav taag lug. Txij thaus u lug txug naj nub nua, mej tsuas pehawm lawv le mej lub sab nyam xwb,
rua qhov mej tseem tsi tau moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, qhov ntawd mej yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.

Thaus mej hlaa dlhau tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tid lawm, tug TSWV yuav muab lub tebchaws ntawd rua mej nyob ua mej tug. Nwg yuav paab kuas mej dlim ntawm mej cov yeebncuab, hab mej yuav tau nyob kaaj sab lug.

Tug TSWV yuav xaiv ib thaaj chaw ca ua qhov chaw rua mej moog pehawm nwg, hab mej yuavtsum coj txhua yaam kws kuv tau qha rua mej lawm, tuaj fij rua tug TSWV: mej tej khoom hlawv fij theej txhoj hab lwm yaam khoom fij, tej ib feem kaum, tej khoom fij sis raug zoo hab tej khoom kws mej coglug fij tshwjxeeb rua tug TSWV.

Mej, mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas, mej tej tubqhe hab cov Levis kws nrug mej nyob huv mej tej nroog, ca le zoo sab taabmeeg tug TSWV; mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov has tas, cov Levis yuav tsi muaj aav ua puab tug.
Mej tsi xob coj mej tej khoom moog fij rua ntawm qhov chaw kws mej nyam;
mej yuavtsum coj mej tej khoom moog fij rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV xaiv ntawm mej ib xeem le aav, hab mej moog hlawv khoom fij rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV qha rua mej lawm xwb.

“Tabsis tej tsaj kws mej tua noj, mej nyob qhov twg, mej tua rua qhov ntawd los tau. Mej noj tau lawv le tug TSWV pub rua mej muaj. Cov tuabneeg kws huv hab tsi huv los puavleej noj tau tej tsaj ntawd, ib yaam le mej noj tej nqaj kauv hab nqaj muaslwj.
Tabsis mej tsi xob noj tej tsaj ntawd cov ntshaav; mej yuavtsum muab laub povtseg ib yaam le laub dlej.

Tsi pub mej nqaa tej khoom kws mej muab fij rua tug TSWV lawm lug noj huv mej tej tsev, tsi has tej ib feem kaum kws yog mej tej qoobloo, tej cawv txiv maab, tej roj txiv ntoo, lossis thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj hab mivnyuas yaaj, tej khoom kws mej coglug muab fij rua tug TSWV, tej khoom kws mej txaus sab muab fij lossis lwm yaam khoom fij.

Mej hab mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas, mej tej tubqhe hab cov Levis kws nrug mej nyob huv mej tej nroog, mej tsuas noj tau tej khoom fij nuav taabmeeg tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv xaiv tseg ua qhov chaw pehawm nwg xwb. Mej ca le txaus sab rua tej kws Vaajtswv foom koob moov rua mej moog khwv tau lug.
Tam twg kws mej tseem nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, mej tsi xob tso cov Levis tseg le.
“Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv pub mej tau lub tebchaws dlaav ntxiv, lawv le nwg tub coglug tseg rua mej lawm, mej yuav tua mej tej tsaj noj thaus twg los tau lawv le mej sab nyam.

Yog has tas, qhov chaw kws mej moog pehawm tug TSWV nyob dleb mej heev lawm, mej xaav tua tej nyuj hab tej yaaj kws tug TSWV pub rua mej muaj, mej ca le tua hab noj tau huv mej tej tsev lawv le kuv qha rua mej lawm.
Mej txhua tug, tsi has cov tuabneeg huv hab tsi huv los puavleej noj tau cov nqaj ntawd, ib yaam le mej noj tej nqaj kauv hab nqaj muaslwj.
Tabsis tsi xob noj tej nqaj kws txhaam ntshaav, rua qhov ntshaav yog txujsa. Mej tsi xob noj txujsa nrug cov nqaj.
Mej tsi xob muab ntshaav ua zaub noj, tabsis mej ca le muab laub povtseg ib yaam le laub dlej.
Yog mej ua lawv le kuv tej lug qha nuav, tug TSWV yuav txaus sab rua mej, mej hab mej tej xeebntxwv yuav noj qaab nyob zoo.
Ca le coj mej tej khoom fij hab mej tej khoom pub kws mej coglug moog fij rua tug TSWV ntawm qhov chaw kws mej pehawm nwg.

Ca le coj mej tej khoom fij kws muab hlawv taagnrho, tej nqaj hab tej ntshaav moog hlawv rua sau tug TSWV lub thaaj. Hab tej khoom fij kws mej noj tej nqaj, mej muab cov ntshaav laub rua sau lub thaaj.

Mej yuavtsum muab sab rau ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej, mej hab mej tej xeebntxwv txhaj yuav noj qaab nyob zoo moog ibtxhis, rua qhov mej ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub sab nyam.
“Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav ua kuas tej tsaav tuabneeg kws mej taabtom yuav moog tua puab hab puab lub tebchaws kuas puamtsuaj taag, mej yuav tau lub tebchaws ntawd nyob ua mej tug.

Tom qaab kws tug TSWV ua rua tej tsaav tuabneeg ntawd puamtsuaj taag lawm, mej ncu ntsoov tsi xob pe mlom le puab, nyob tsaam mej raug puamtsuaj. Tsi xob laam moog xauj, saib puab pe puab tej vaajtswv le caag, ces mej txawm yuav pe mej tug Vaajtswv le ntawd.

Mej tsi xob pehawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ib yaam le puab pe puab tej vaajtswv, rua qhov thaus puab pe puab tej vaajtswv, puab ua tej kev phem kev qas kws tug TSWV ntxub heev. Puab muab puab tej mivnyuas tua hlawv fij rua sau puab tej thaaj.
“Mej yuavtsum ua txhua yaam lawv le tej lug kws kuv qha rua mej lawm; mej tsi xob ntxiv lossis rhu ib lus le.
“Yog muaj ib tug cevlug lossis ib tug txawj txhais npau suav has tas, yuav muaj tej txujci tseemceeb lossis tej xwmtxheej kws ua rua suavdlawg xaav tsi thoob,
coj mej moog pe puab tej vaajtswv kws mej tsi tau pe dlua. Txawm yog tej kws nwg has ntawd muaj tseeb
los mej tsi xob ntseeg tej lug kws nwg has ntawd le. Rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv siv nwg sim mej sab, saib mej puas hlub tug TSWV kawg sab kawg ntsws tag.
Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug hab fwm nwg; ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai hab noog nwg lug; muab sab npuab hab pehawm nwg.

Mej ca le muab tug kws txawj txhais npau suav lossis tug cevlug kws qha kuas mej ntxeev sab rua tug TSWV kws tso mej dlim kev ua qhev nraag tebchaws Iziv lug tua povtseg. Tug ntawd yog tuabneeg phem, nwg ntxag kuas mej muab txujkev kws tug TSWV qha rua mej coj tso povtseg. Mej yuavtsum muab tug ntawd tua, mej txhaj dlim txujkev phem nuav.

“Txawm yog koj tug kwvtij kws koom nam koom txiv, lossis koj tej tub tej ntxhais, koj tug quaspuj kws koj hlub, lossis koj tug phoojywg zoo, yum koj tuabywv has tas, peb ca le moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv kws koj hab koj cov yawmkoob tsi tau pe dlua le.
Puab cov nuav ib tug yuav ntxag hab yum kuas koj ca le moog nrug cov tuabneeg kws nyob dleb lossis nyob ze koj pe puab tej vaajtswv,
los koj tsi xob ca nwg ntxag tau koj; tsi xob noog nwg has. Tsi xob mov lossis taabncuab nwg, hab tsi xob npog nwg.
Ca le muab nwg tua! Koj yog thawj tug kws muab pobzeb ntaus nwg, ces suavdlawg maam le ntaus tom qaab.
Ca le muab pobzeb ntaus kuas nwg tuag! Rua qhov nwg txhobtxwm coj mej tawm ntawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv kws mej ua luas qhev lug.
Thaus cov Yixalayees nov txug zaaj nuav; puab txhaj ntshai hab tsi muaj leejtwg moog ua txujkev phem nuav lawm.
“Thaus mej nyob huv tej nroog kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, mej yuav nov
cov tuabneeg phem qee leej huv mej tsaav tuabneeg tau coj mej cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv puab tej nroog moog pe tej vaajtswv kws mej tsi tau pe dlua le.
Yog mej nov tej zaaj tsi zoo le ntawd, mej yuavtsum maaj nrooj moog tshuaj saib puas muaj tseeb; yog muaj tug tau moog ua phem ua qas le ntawd tag,
ces ca le muab cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog hab puab tej tsaj txhu tua kuas tuag taag hab rhuav puab lub nroog kuas puamtsuaj taag huv tuabsi.

Ca le moog sau cov tuabneeg ntawd tej khoom lug tso ua ib pawg rua ntawm tshaav puam huv lub nroog, ces muab lub nroog hab txhua yaam hlawv ua khoom fij rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. Ca lub nroog ntawd pemsij moog ibtxhis tsi xob tsim dlua ntxiv lawm.

Mej tsi xob yuav tej khoom kws yuav muab hlawv fij rua tug TSWV ib yaam le. Tug TSWV txhaj yuav taabncuab mej hab tsi chim rua mej. Nwg yuav taabncuab mej hab pub kuas mej fuamvaam coob lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm,
rua qhov mej ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej.

“Mej yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg, thaus mej moog nyav tej tuabneeg tuag, mej tsi xob hlais mej lub cev lossis chais mej cov plaubhau ntawm hauvplaj ib yaam le lwm tsaav tuabneeg ua.
Mej yog tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv; nwg tau xaiv mej tawm ntawm ntau tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
“Mej tsi xob noj tej tsaj kws tug TSWV has tas, yog tsaj tsi huv.
Mej noj tau tej tsaj nuav: nyuj, yaaj, tshis,
muaslwj, nyuj kau, sai lossis kauv
hab txhua yaam tsaj kws rau taw ncau hab zum zaub.

tabsis tej tsaj kws rau taw tsi ncau hab tsi zum zaub, mas mej tsi xob noj le. Mej tsi xob noj ntxhuav, luav lossis loobtswb. Cov tsaj nuav yog tsaj tsi huv; cov tsaj nuav rau taw ncau tabsis tsi zum zaub.
Mej tsi xob noj nqaj npuas. Npua yog tsaj tsi huv; npua rau taw ncau tabsis tsi zum zaub. Mej tsi xob noj cov tsaj nuav lossis kov cov tsaj ntawd lub cev tuag.
“Mej noj tau tej ntseg kws muaj xab hab muaj khum,
tabsis tej tsaj nyob huv dlej kws tsi muaj xab hab tsi muaj khum, mej tsi xob noj; cov ntawd yog tsaj tsi huv.
“Mej noj tau tej noog kws huv.

Tej noog nuav yog tej kws tsi huv mej tsi xob noj: dlaav, plaas, laj, kaub kiyaaj, tsaw nqeeb, dlaav npoj, uab laag, noog ntxhuav, noog havtxwv, noog paag hawv, noog noj ntseg, roov dlev, us dlej,  kus ntxhuav hab puav.
“Txhua yaam kaab muaj tis kws tsi huv, mej tsi xob noj.
Tabsis txhua yaam kaab muaj tis kws huv mej noj tau.

“Mej tsi xob noj tej tsaj kws mob tuag, ca cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob noj xwb lossis muab muag rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws; rua qhov mej yog tsaav tuabneeg kws dlawbhuv rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv. “Mej tsi xob muab mivnyuas yaaj lossis mivnyuas tshis cov nqaj hau nrug leej nam cov kua mig.
“Mej yuavtsum tshwj ib feem kaum ntawm tej qoobloo kws mej ua hab sau tau huv ib lub xyoos

coj moog rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv xaiv tseg ca ua qhov chaw pehawm nwg; hab mej noj tej ib feem kaum kws yog nplej, cawv txiv maab, roj txiv ntoo, thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj hab mivnyuas yaaj taabmeeg tug TSWV. Mej ua le nuav txhaj yog mej fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv moog ibtxhis le.

Yog lub chaw kws pehawm tug TSWV nyob dleb heev, mej coj tsi tau mej tej ib feem kaum ntawm mej tej qoobloo kws mej tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej ua hab sau tau lug moog fij rua nwg, ces mej ua le nuav:
Mej muab tej qoob ib feem kaum ntawd muag hab coj cov nyaj moog fij rua tug TSWV ntawm qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV.

Mej muab cov nyaj ntawd yuav nqaj nyuj, nqaj yaaj, cawv txiv maab cawv ntxws hab lwm yaam kws mej xaav yuav. Ces mej hab mej tsev tuabneeg noj haus hab zoo sab taabmeeg tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv qhov ntawd.
“Mej tsi xob tso cov Levis kws nrug mej nyob huv mej tej nroog tseg, rua qhov puab tsi muaj aav ua puab tug.
Txhua peb lub xyoos twg, coj ib feem kaum ntawm tej qoobloo kws mej ua hab sau tau lug tso rua huv mej tej nroog.

Tej qoobloo ntawd yog muab rua cov Levis, rua qhov puab tsi muaj aav ua puab tug, hab muab rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab cov puj ntsuag kws nrug mej nyob huv mej tej nroog kuas puab txhaj tau tej ntawd noj. Mej ua le nuav tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv txhaj foom koob moov rua txhua yaam kws mej ua.
“Txhua xyaa lub xyoo twg, mej yuavtsum xuam tej nyaj kws luas tshuav mej nqe.

Tej kws mej yuav tau xuam yog le nuav: tej nyaj kws mej qev rua mej ib tug kwvtij Yixalayees, yuavtsum xuam rua nwg. Mej tsi xob tsib cov nyaj ntawd rov qaab; rua qhov tug TSWV kuas mej xuam tej nuj nqes ntawd.
Mej tsib tau tej nyaj kws mej qev rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, tabsis mej tsi xob tsib cov nyaj kws mej cov kwvtij tshuav mej nqe.
“Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav foom koob moov rua mej thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwg coglug muab rua mej. Nwg yuav tsi pub mej ib tug twg pluag le.
Yog mej fwm tug TSWV hab ua lawv le tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej,

tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua mej, lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm. Mej yuav muaj nyaj qev rua ntau tsaav tuabneeg, mej yuav tsi moog txais nyaj ntawm ib tsaav tuabneeg twg le, mej yuav kaav ntau tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis yuav tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg kaav mej.

“Thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, yog mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees ib tug twg txomnyem nyob huv mej tej nroog, mej tsi xob ua tuabneeg cuamkhum hab tsi kaam paab tug ntawd.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum ua tuabneeg sab dlawb sab zoo hab qev nyaj rua nwg kuas txaus le nwg xaav yuav.

Txawm yog tub ze rua xyoo kws xuam nuj nqes lawm los mej yuavtsum qev rua nwg. Mej tsi xob muaj lub sab xaav phem. Yog mej tsi kaam qev, nwg yuav quaj thov tug TSWV foom phem rua mej, ces mej yuav raug txim.
Mej yuavtsum zoo sab hlo muab rua nwg ntawm lub sab dlawb paug, tug TSWV txhaj yuav foom koob moov rua txhua yaam kws mej ua.
Mej muaj cov kwvtij Yixalayees txomnyem kws nrug mej nyob. Yog le ntawd, kuv has rua mej tas, mej yuavtsum ua sab dlawb sab zoo rua puab.
“Yog cov Yixalayees muaj ib tug twg, tsi has quaspuj lossis txivneej muab nwg muag rua mej  ua mej tug qhev, thaus kws nwg ua num rua mej puv rau lub xyoo lawm, xyoo xyaa, mej yuavtsum tso nwg moog.
Thaus mej tso nwg moog, tsi xob ca nwg moog teg dlawb teg nplag.
Mej yuavtsum ua sab dlawb sab zoo, muab tej kws tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej muaj kws yog: yaaj, nplej hab cawv txiv maab pub rua nwg coj moog.
Ncu ntsoov has tas, thaus mej nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv, mej ua luas qhev, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau tso mej dlim; tub yog vim le ntawd, nub nua kuv txhaj qha tej nuav rua mej.
“Tabsis yog has tas mej tug qhev tsi kaam moog; vim nwg ncawg mej tsev tuabneeg hab thov nrug mej nyob,
mej coj nwg moog rua ntawm qhovrooj, hab muab nwg pobntseg tho; ces nwg yuav ua mej qhev moog taag nwg simneej. Mej ua ib yaam le ntawd rua mej tug ntxhais qhev hab,

tsi xob nyuaj sab thaus kws mej yuav tso ib tug qhev tawm moog, rua qhov nwg ua num rua mej rau lub xyoo, nwg tsuas tau nqe zug npaum le ib nraab ntawm tug kws mej ndlav ua num xwb.  Mej yuavtsum ua le nuav, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv txhaj yuav foom koob moov rua tej kws mej ua.

“Mej yuavtsum xaiv thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj hab mivnyuas yaaj kws yog tug txiv tshwj rua ib caag ca fij rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv; tsi xob siv cov mivnyuas nyuj ntawd ua num, hab tsi xob muab cov mivnyuas yaaj ntawd txav plaub.
Txhua xyoo mej hab mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas yuavtsum noj tej nqaj ntawd taabmeeg tug TSWV ntawm qhov chaw kws mej pehawm nwg.
Tabsis yog has tas, tej tsaj ntawd cegtawv, dligmuag lossis muaj mob, mej tsi xob muab tug tsaj ntawd moog fij rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Mej tua cov tsaj ntawd noj tau huv mej tej tsev, tsi has cov tuabneeg huv hab tsi huv, puavleej noj tau ib yaam le noj tej nqaj kauv lossis nqaj muaslwj.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum tsi xob noj cov ntshaav; mej yuavtsum muab laub povtseg ib yaam le laub dlej.
“Mej yuavtsum ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua thaus lub hlis Anpis, qhuas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv; rua qhov lub hlis ntawd, muaj ib mos yog mo kws tug TSWV coj mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Mej ca le coj ib tug nyuj lossis ib tug yaaj moog rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV, hab muab tua ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau qhuas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.

Thaus mej noj cov nqaj ntawd, mej tsi xob noj cov ncuav kws xyaw keeb, xyaa nub ntawd mej yuavtsum noj cov ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb ib yaam le thaus mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, mej maaj heev, mej txhaj noj tej ncuav kws tsi xyaw keeb; cov ncuav ntawd hu ua ncuav txomnyem sab, mej ua le nuav mej txhaj yuav ncu ntsoov nub kws mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv qhov chaw kws mej raug kev txomnyem.
Xyaa nub ntawd, tsi pub ib tug twg kws nyob huv mej lub tebchaws muaj tej keeb ncuav nyob huv tsev le; tug tsaj kws mej tua thawj mo, mej yuavtsum noj kuas taag dlu lug rua mo ntawd.

“Tsuas pub mej tua tsaj ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau rua ntawm qhov chaw kws mej pehawm tug TSWV xwb, tsi pub mej tua rua lwm qhov huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej. Mej ua rua thaus nub poob qho kws yog lub caij mej tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
Mej hau cov nqaj ntawd noj rua ntawm qhov chaw kws mej pehawm tug TSWV; hab nub tom qaab sawv ntxuv mej maam le rov moog tsev.
Rua qhov rau nub tom ntej mej yuav noj ncuav tsi xyaw keeb, hab nub xyaa mej yuavtsum tuaj ua ke pehawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab nub ntawd mej tsi xob ua num.
“Mej suav xyaa lub limtam, txij nub kws mej pib sau qoobloo moog,
mej maam le ua kevcai sau qoobloo qhuas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, hab coj tej khoom fij kws mej txaus sab muab rua tug TSWV lawv le nwg tau foom koob moov rua mej moog fij rua nwg.

Mej hab mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas, cov tubkhai, cov Levis, cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab cov puj ntsuag kws nyob huv mej tej nroog, ca le noj zoo sab taabmeeg tug TSWV rua ntawm qhov chaw kws mej pehawm nwg.
Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov ua lawv le tej lug qha nuav; hab ncu ntsoov qhov kws mej ua luas qhev nraag tebchaws Iziv.
“Tom qaab kws mej ntaus nplej hab tsu kua txiv maab taag lawm, mej ca le ua kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab xyaa nub.
Mej hab mej tej quaspuj mivnyuas, cov tubkhai, cov Levis, hab tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab cov puj ntsuag kws nrug mej nyob huv mej tej nroog,

ca le ua Kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab xyaa nub qhuas tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, ntawm qhov chaw kws mej pehawm nwg. Mej ca le zoo sab rua qhov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua mej tej qoobloo hab tej num kws mej ua.
