“Mej tsaav tuabneeg txhua tug txivneej yuavtsum tuaj pehawm tug TSWV ntawm qhov chaw kws nwg xaiv ca ib xyoos peb zag: ua Kevcai Hlaa Dlhau, ua Kevcai Sau Qoobloo hab ua Kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab. Txhua tug tsi xob tuaj teg dlawb teg nplag, nyag yuavtsum nqaa nyag ib yaam khoom
tuaj fij rua tug TSWV, lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau foom koob moov rua mej lawm.

“Mej yuavtsum tsaa ib paab tuabneeg ua cov txav txim hab tsaa ib cov numtswv ua cov tswjfwm nyob rua huv txhua lub nroog kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej lawm. Cov kws mej tsaa ntawd yuav txav txim ncaaj nceeg rua mej tsaav tuabneeg.

Puab yuavtsum coj txujkev ncaaj nceeg tsi xob tso tseg, tsi xob txav txim tsi ncaaj, hab tsi xob yuav luas tej nyaj xab, rua qhov tej nyaj xab ntawd yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg hab txawj ntse qhovmuag faam txav txim tsi ncaaj.
Mej yuavtsum ua ncaaj hab ua zoo nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav muab rua mej, mej txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev rua huv lub tebchaws ntawd.
“Thaus mej ua ib lub thaaj rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej tsi xob txhus tug mlom ntoo Aselas rua ntawm lub thaaj ib saab;
hab mej tsi xob txhus ncej zeb ua ib tug mlom rua mej pe; rua qhov tug TSWV ntxub tej mlom ntawd.
“Mej tsi xob coj tug nyuj lossis tug yaaj kws dligmuag lossis cegtawv tuaj fij rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv; tug TSWV ntxub qhov kws mej ua le nuav.
Yog has tas, huv mej tej nroog muaj ib tug quaspuj lossis ib tug txivneej ua txhum rua tug TSWV hab rhuav nwg tej lug cog tseg,
moog pe lwm tug vaajtswv, pe lub nub, lub hli lossis pe tej nubqub kws tug TSWV txwv tsi pub pe.
Yog muaj tuabneeg qha tej ntawd rua mej, mej yuavtsum ua tuab zoo tshuaj saib, yog muaj tug ua phem le ntawd nyob rua huv cov Yixalayees tag,
mej ca le coj tug ntawd moog rua saab nrau ntug nroog hab muab pobzeb ntaus nwg kuas tuag.
Yog muaj ob lossis peb leeg ua timkhawv has tas tug ntawd ua txhum, mej txhaj muaj cai muab nwg tua; yog muaj ib leeg ua timkhawv xwb, mej tsi xob muab nwg tua.
Cov kws ua timkhawv yuavtsum xub muab pobzeb ntaus tug kws ua txhum, suavdlawg maam le muab pobzeb ntaus tom qaab. Mej yuavtsum ua le ntawd txhaj tshem tau txujkev phem huv mej moog.

“Yog has tas, nyob huv mej lub nroog muaj tej rooj plaub nyuaj kws tsi pum qaab txav txim kws yog plaub sis txeeb teb, plaub sis ntaus nqaj ndluag ntshaav nrug lossis plaub tua tuabneeg. Thaus muaj le ntawd, mej ca le coj moog rua ntawm qhov chaw kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau xaiv ca ua lub chaw pehawm nwg.
Mej ca le peev lug rua cov povthawj hab cov txav txim kws yog cov tu plaub noog, puab yuav taug hab tu rooj plaub ntawd.
Puab yog cov kws yuav txav txim sab, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le puab kuas mej ua.
Mej ca le yuav lawv le puab tu hab ua lawv puab has rua mej txhua yaam huv tuabsi.
Yog leejtwg tsi noog tug povthawj lossis tug tu plaub lub sijhawm ntawd has, ca le muab tug ntawd tua, mej ua le nuav txhaj tshem tau txujkev phem tawm huv cov Yixalayees moog.
Thaus suavdlawg nov zaaj nuav, puab yuav ntshai hab tsi ua phem le ntawd lawm.

“Thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, mej yuav has tas, ‘Peb yuav tsaa kuas muaj vaajntxwv lug kaav peb ib yaam le luas lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob puagncig peb.’
Mej ca le tsaa tug kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv xaiv ca ua vaajntxwv kaav mej. Yog tsaa mej cov kwvtij ib tug ua vaajntxwv; tsi yog tsaa lwm tsaav tuabneeg.

Tug vaajntxwv tsi xob muaj neeg coob dlhau rua nwg cov tubrog, hab tsi xob khaiv nwg cov tuabneeg moog yuav neeg  nraag tebchaws Iziv, rua qhov tug TSWV txwv tsi pub mej rov moog nraag tebchaws Iziv le lawm.
Tug vaajntxwv tsi xob yuav ntau tug quaspuj, nyob tsaam nwg tso tug TSWV tseg; hab nwg tsi xob ua kuas nwg npluanuj, muaj nyaj muaj kub ntau dlhau.

Thaus nwg ua vaajntxwv kaav lub tebchaws, nwg kuas tuabneeg moog muab phoo ntawv kws sau Vaajtswv tej lug hab tej kevcai ntawm cov Levis kws ua povthawj lug theej dlua ib phoo lawv nraim le thawj phoo rua nwg.
Nwg yuavtsum khaws phoo ntawv nuav hab naj nub nyeem moog taag nwg simneej, nwg txhaj le paub fwm tug TSWV hab ua lawv le txhua yaam kws qha tseg rua huv phoo ntawv ntawd.

Yog nwg ua le ntawd, nwg yuav tsi khaav has tas nwg yog tug zoo tshaaj nwg cov kwvtij Yixalayees, hab nwg txhaj tsi tso tug TSWV txuj kevcai tseg. Nwg yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav ntev, hab nwg caajceg txhaj yuav tau ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Yixalayees moog ntau tam.
“Cov Levis kws ua povthawj hab taagnrho xeem Levis tsi muaj feem nrug cov Yixalayees faib aav, puab tsuas tau noj tej kws luas coj tuaj fij hab tej kws luas zoo sab coj tuaj pub rua tug TSWV xwb.
Puab tsi nrug puab cov kwvtij muaj laj muaj teb lug ua puab tug; puab feem yog ua tug TSWV cov povthawj lawv le tug TSWV coglug tseg lawm.
“Thaus luas coj nyuj lossis yaaj tuaj tua fij, mas ib ceg teg, lub puabtsaig hab lub plaab yog cov povthawj feem.
Thaus cov Yixalayees muab thawj phaum qoob ibtxha kws yog nplej, cawv txiv maab, roj txiv ntoo hab cov plaub yaaj kws puab txav thawj zag coj tuaj fij, tej ntawd yog cov Levis tug.
Tug TSWV xaiv xeem Levis tawm ntawm mej txhua xeem lug ua cov povthawj ua nwg teg num moog ibtxhis le.
“Yog cov Levis kws nyob huv mej tej nroog xaav moog rua lwm lub nroog kws muaj chaw pehawm tug TSWV los nwg yeej moog tau,
nwg yuav moog ua povthawj ua num rua tug TSWV kws yog nwg tug Vaajtswv, ib yaam le nwg cov kwvtij Levis kws taabtom ua rua tug TSWV ntawd.
Nwg muaj feem tau noj sis npaug zog ib yaam le lwm tug povthawj, tsi xaam tej kws nwg cov kwvtij coj tuaj rua nwg.
“Thaus mej moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, mej tsi xob moog xyum coj hab ua tej kev phem kev qas le cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd ua.
Mej tsi xob muab mej tej mivnyuas tua hlawv fij, tsi xob saib yaig, tsi xob xaam noobnyoog, tsi xob khov kuam,
tsi xob ua khawvkoob hab tsi xob moog cuag txivneeb txivyaig.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ntxub cov tuabneeg kws ua tej kev phem kev qas le ntawd, tub yog le ntawd nwg txhaj muab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd ntab tawm ua ntej mej moog nyob.
Mej yuavtsum muab sab npuab tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws.”

Mauxes has rua puab tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog tua hab nyob ntawd, puab saib yaig hab xaam noobnyoog, tabsis tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsi pub mej ua le puab ua.
Tug TSWV yuav xaiv ib tug huv mej tsaav tuabneeg lug ua tug cevlug ib yaam le kuv. Mej yuavtsum noog nwg lug.

“Nub kws mej moog rua ntawm Roob Xinais, mej thov kuas tug TSWV tsi xob has lug rua mej hab tsi xob pub mej pum tej nplaim tawg kws tug TSWV nyob huv ntxiv lawm, rua qhov mej ntshai nyob tsaam mej tuag.
Tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, ‘Yeej yog le puab tej lug thov.
Kuv yuav xaiv puab tsaav tuabneeg ib tug lug ua tug cevlug ib yaam le koj; kuv yuav qha kuas tug cevlug  ntawd pav kuv tej lug txhua lu rua suavdlawg.
Tug cevlug tuav kuv lub npe qha rua suavdlawg, yog leejtwg tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws nwg yuav has, ces kuv  yuav rau txim rua tug ntawd.
Tabsis yog ib tug cevlug twg laam tuav kuv lub npe qha ib yaam dlaabtsi kws kuv tsi tau kuas nwg has, hab tug cevlug kws laam tuav lwm tug vaajtswv lub npe qha yuav tuag.’
“Mej yuav paub has tas, tej lug kws tug cevlug has tsi yog tug TSWV tej lug,

yog tug cevlug kws tuav tug TSWV lub npe has tas, yuav muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi tshwm lug, tabsis tsi muaj dlaabtsi tshwm lawv le nwg has ntawd, tej lug ntawd tsi yog tug TSWV lug, tug cevlug ntawd nwg has nwg xwb, mej tsi xob ntshai nwg.
“Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwg yuav muab rua mej ua kuas puamtsuaj, hab thaus mej moog nyob huv puab tej nroog hab puab tej tsev,

mej muab lub tebchaws faib ua peb feem, tu ib lub nroog huv ib feem kws nyob rua qhov chaw moog rua huv yoojyim. Yog muaj ib tug twg tua yuam kev raug lwm tug tuag, nwg txhaj tau kev tsiv moog cawm sav huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub.
Yog ib tug twg tua yuam kev raug lwm tug tuag kws tsi yog nwg tug yeebncuab, nwg tsiv moog cawm sav huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub, kuas luas tsi xob muab nwg tua.

Yog has tas, muaj ob tug tuabneeg ua ke moog txav ntoo huv haav zoov, thaus ib tug taabtom ntuv ntoo, nwg raab taus hle moog raug ib tug tuag lawm, nwg ca le tsiv moog cawm sav huv cov nroog ntawd ib lub, kuas luas tsi xob muab nwg tua.

Yog muaj ib lub nroog cawm sav xwb, nyob tsaam txujkev moog rua lub nroog ntawd dleb heev, yog has tas tug tuag cov kwvtij chim, puab yuav lawv qaab moog nteg tau nwg, ces puab yuav ca le muab tug kws tsi muaj txim ntawd tua. Qhov kws tug ntawd tuag yog nwg yuam kev xwb, tsi yog txhobtxwm tua, rua qhov obtug tsi yog yeebncuab.
Yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj kuas mej tshwj peb lub nroog cawm sav tseg.
“Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv pub kuas mej tau lub tebchaws dlaav zuj zug ntxiv lawv le nwg coglug rua mej cov yawmkoob lawm has tas nwg yuav muab rua mej,

mej rov xaiv dlua peb lub nroog ca ua nroog cawm sav. (Yog mej ua lawv tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, hab ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai txhua nqai, nwg yuav muab taagnrho lub tebchaws rua mej.)
Mej yuavtsum ua le nuav, tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim txhaj tsi raug tua tuag rua huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV muab rua mej, mej txhaj tsi tau ris nwg lub txim.
“Tabsis yog leejtwg moog tog kev muab nwg tug yeebncuab tua tuag, ces txawm yog nwg tsiv moog kaum rua huv cov nroog cawm sav ntawd lub twg los xij,
cov kev txwjlaug kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd yuav tso tuabneeg moog nteg nwg rov lug cob rua tug tuag cov kwvtij, puab yuav muab nwg tua povtseg pauj qhov kws nwg tua tuabneeg.
Mej tsi xob hlub nwg. Ca le muab nwg tshem tawm huv cov Yixalayees moog, mej txhaj tau nyob kaaj sab lug.
“Mej tsi xob naam mej cov kwvtij tug nrimteb kws tej laug tu tseg, thaus mej nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav muab rua mej.
“Yog ib tug ua timkhawv ntxo lwm tug kws ua txhum xwb tsi txaus; yuavtsum yog muaj ob lossis peb leeg ua timkhawv txhaj le ntseeg tau.
Yog muaj leejtwg ua timkhawv cuav ntxo ib tug twg has tas, tug ntawd tau ua txhum,
kuas obtug moog rua ntawm lub chaw pehawm tug TSWV, ca cov povthawj hab cov txav txim tu plaub rua obtug.
Cov txav txim yuavtsum ua tuab zoo taug rooj plaub ntawd; yog tug ntawd laam ua timkhawv cuav ntxo nwg tug kwvtij Yixalayees xwb,
mej yuavtsum tau rau txim rua tug kws ua timkhawv cuav ntawd ib yaam le lub txim kws nwg ntxo lwm tug. Mej ua le ntawd, mej txhaj tshem tau tej kev phem kev qas nuav moog.
Thaus kws txhua tug nov, puab txhaj yuav ntshai hab tsi ua txhum le ntawd ntxiv lawm.
Mej tsi xob hlub nwg le; yuavtsum ca sav pauj sav, qhovmuag pauj qhovmuag, nav pauj nav, teg pauj teg hab kutaw pauj kutaw.

“Thaus mej moog tua mej cov yeebncuab, yog mej pum puab muaj tsheb neeg, neeg hab tubrog coob tshaaj mej los mej tsi xob ntshai puab. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, tug kws cawm mej dlim nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, yuav nrug nraim mej.
Ua ntej mej yuav moog ntaus rog, ib tug povthawj yuav tuaj has rua cov tubrog tas,
‘Ib tsoom tubrog Yixalayees, mej noog kuv has! Nub nua mej yuav sawv kev moog tua rog, tabsis mej tsi xob ntshai mej cov yeebncuab, tsi xob ntaus sab yau lossis txhawj.
Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav nrug mej moog hab paab kuas mej tua yeej.’

“Ces cov numtswv yuav has rua mej tas, ‘Puas muaj leejtwg ua tau tsev, tabsis tsi tau muab fij rua tug TSWV? Yog muaj, nwg ca le rov moog tsev. Nyob tsaam nwg moog raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog, ces lwm tug yuav tau muab nwg lub tsev fij rua tug TSWV.

Puas muaj leejtwg nyavnyuas moog cog tau txiv maab, tabsis tsi tau moog dle ib zag le? Yog muaj, nwg ca le rov moog tsev, nyob tsaam nwg moog raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog, ces lwm tug yuav zoo sab kws tau noj nwg tej txiv maab ntawd.

Puas muaj leejtwg qhab tau ib tug hluas nkauj, tabsis tsi tau yuav? Yog muaj, nwg ca le rov moog tsev. Nyob tsaam nwg moog raug tua tuag rua huv tshaav rog, ces lwm tug yuav tau yuav tug hluas nkauj ntawd.’
“Cov numtswv rov has rua cov tubrog tas, ‘Puas muaj leejtwg ntshai ua rua nwg ib ce tuag taag? Yog muaj, nwg ca le rov moog tsev. Nyob tsaam nwg ua rua lwm tug tubrog qaug zug.’
Tom qaab kws cov numtswv tuaj has rua cov tubrog taag lawm, puab maam xaiv cov thawjcoj kws saib tej paab tubrog ntawd.
“Thaus mej moog tua mej cov yeebncuab tej nroog, mej yuavtsum ca sijhawm rua cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog tsaa teg thov mej.
Yog puab qheb roojvaag hab tsaa teg thov mej, puab yuav tau ua mej qhev hab ua num rua mej.
Tabsis yog puab tsi tsaa teg thov mej, puab yuav nrug mej sis tua, mej cov tubrog ca le vij puab lub nroog.
Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ca mej txeeb tau puab lub nroog lawm, mej ca le muab txhua tug txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog ntawd tua huv tuabsi.

Txawm le ntawd los pub mej coj puab tej quaspuj mivnyuas, tej tsaj txhu hab tej khoom kws nyob huv lub nroog lug. Mej siv tau txhua yaam kws yog mej cov yeebncuab le. Tej ntawd yog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej.
Mej yuavtsum ua le ntawd rua cov nroog kws nyob dleb lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav moog nyob ntawd.
“Thaus mej moog txeeb tau tej nroog huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, mej yuavtsum muab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tua huv tuabsi.
Mej yuavtsum tua cov Hitis, cov Amaules, cov Kana-aas, cov Pelixes, cov Hivis hab cov Yenpus, kuas tuag taag lawv le tug TSWV has rua mej lawm.
Mej ua le ntawd puab txhaj tsi coj mej moog pe puab tej vaajtswv, kuas mej ua txhum tawmtsaam tug TSWV.

“Thaus mej moog tua ib lub nroog twg, txawm yog yuav siv sijhawm moog vij ntev los mej tsi xob ntuv tej txiv maab txiv ntoo povtseg. Mej noj tej txiv, tabsis mej tsi xob muab tsob ntoo ntuv; rua qhov tsob ntoo tsi yog mej cov yeebncuab.
Mej ntuv tau lwm yaam ntoo lug thaiv ua chaw tiv sis tua moog txug thaus mej txeeb tau lub nroog.
“Yog mej pum ib tug tuabneeg tuag rua tom tej taj nraag huv mej lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, tabsis tsi paub tas leejtwg tua.
Mej cov thawjcoj hab cov txav txim yuav tau moog ntsuag saib thaaj chaw kws tug tuag nyob ze lub nroog twg tshaaj,
ces cov thawjcoj kws nyob huv lub nroog kws ze tug tuag tshaaj, yuavtsum xaiv ib tug xyuas nyuj kws tsi tau siv laij teb dlua le;

kuas puab caab tug nyuj ntawd moog rua ntawm ib lub haav kws muaj dlej tsi nqhuab le, hab yog ib thaaj chaw kws tsi tau muaj leejtwg khawb cog ib yaam qoob dlaabtsi le, ces puab muab tug nyuj luv cejdlaab rua qhov ntawd.

Cov povthawj yuavtsum moog rua ntawm thaaj chaw ntawd, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv xaiv puab lug ua nwg teg num ntawd, hab tuav tug TSWV lub npe foom koob moov. Puab yog cov kws txav txim sab rua tej plaub ntug kws tuag le ntawd kuas taag.
Ces cov thawjcoj kws nyob huv lub nroog kws ze rua tug tuag ntawd, puab yuav ntxuav teg rua sau tug nyuj,
hab has tas, ‘Peb tsi tau tua tug tuabneeg nuav, hab peb tsi paub has tas yog leejtwg tua.

Tug TSWV, thov koj zaam txim rua koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees kws koj tau cawm puab dlim nraag tebchaws Iziv lug; hab thov tsi xob pub tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim nuav cov ntshaav lug raug koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.’
Yog mej ua lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV kuas mej ua, mej txhaj yuav tsi tau ris tug kws tua tug tuabneeg ntawd lub txim.
“Thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv pub mej tua yeej mej cov yeebncuab lawm, yog mej nteg tau tej tuabneeg lug,
cov tuabneeg kws mej nteg tau lug ntawd, yog muaj ib tug hluas nkauj zoo nkauj kws mej nyam hab xaav yuav ua quaspuj,
mej ca le coj tug hluas nkauj ntawd moog huv mej tsev, kuas nwg chais nwg cov plaubhau,  txav nwg cov rau teg,
hab hloov khaub dluag. Ca nwg nyob huv tsev quaj ntsuag nwg nam hab nwg txiv ib lub hlis; mej maam le yuav nwg ua quaspuj.
Tom qaab ntawd, yog koj tsi xaav yuav nwg lawm, koj yuavtsum tso nwg moog dlawb moog dlo, tsi xob muab nwg muag lossis saib nwg zoo le tug ntxhais qhev, rua qhov koj tsi yuav nwg lawm.
“Yog has tas, ib tug txivneej muaj ob tug quaspuj, hab ob tug quaspuj ntawd puavleej yug tau tub rua nwg, tabsis tug tub hlub tsi yog tug quaspuj kws nwg nyam dlua yug.
Thaus leej txiv faib nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg rua nwg cov tub, nwg tsi xob muab tug tub hlub ntawd feem rua tug tub kws yog tug quaspuj kws nwg nyam dlua yug yuav.

Tabsis leej txiv yuavtsum muab nwg tej qubtxeeg qubteg faib ob npaug rua tug tub hlub, txawm yog tug tub ntawd tsi yog tug quaspuj kws nwg nyam dlua yug los xij. Leej txiv yuavtsum tau leeg paub nwg tug tub hlub, hab faib nwg tug rua nwg lawv le txuj cai kws nwg yog tug tub hlub.
“Yog leejtwg muaj ib tug tub kws tawv ncauj, ntxeev sab hab tsi fwm nam txiv, txawm yog nwg nam hab nwg txiv qhuab ntuag nwg los nwg tsi noog le.
Nwg nam hab nwg txiv ca le coj nwg moog cuag cov thawjcoj huv puab lub nroog hab kuas nwg moog sawv ntawm qhov chaw txav txim;
Ces obtug has rua cov thawjcoj tas, ‘Wb tug tub nuav tawv ncauj, ntxeev sab hab tsi noog wb tej lug qhuab ntuag le; nwg muab tej nyaj coj moog siv ua phuam laam taag, hab ua tuabneeg quav cawv.’
Ces cov txivneej huv lub nroog ntawd ca le muab pobzeb ntaus tug tub ntawd kuas tuag, mej txhaj tshem tau txujkev phem kev qas ntawd moog. Cov Yixalayees txhua tug kws nov zaaj nuav yuav ntshai heev.
“Yog muaj ib tug txivneej twg ua txhum luj, nwg raug muab dlai cejdlaab tuag,

tsi xob ca dlai ib mos rua ntawd. Mej yuavtsum muab nwg lub cev txu moog log nub ntawd, rua qhov lub cev tuag kws dlai le ntawd, yuav ua rua Vaajtswv foom phem rua mej lub tebchaws. Mej ca le muab tug tuag lub cev log, txhaj tsi ua rua lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej tsi huv.
“Yog mej pum mej ib tug kwvtij Yixalayees twg tug nyuj lossis tug yaaj yuam kev tuaj rua ntawm mej, mej tsi xob ua tug tsi pum, mej ca le coj tug tsaj ntawd moog rua tug tswv.

Yog has tas tug tswv nyob dleb lossis mej tsi paub has tas tug tswv yog leejtwg, mej ca le coj tug tsaj ntawd lug rua ntawm mej tsev, hab paab ceev tseg moog txug thaus tug tswv tsaj tuaj nrhav, mej maam le muab rua tug tswv coj rov moog tsev.
Yog mej pum mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees ib tug twg tug neeg luav, nwg tej tsoog tsho lossis ib yaam dlaabtsi kws pluj lawm los mej ua ib yaam le ntawd.
“Yog mej moog pum mej ib tug kwvtij Yixalayees twg ib tug neeg luav lossis ib tug nyuj qaug rua ntawm kev, mej tsi xob ua tug tsi pum; mej ca le paab muab tug tsaj ntawd tsaa sawv.
“Tej quaspuj tsi xob naav txivneej tej tsoog tsho hab tej txivneej los tsi xob naav quaspuj tej tsoog tsho; tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ntxub cov tuabneeg kws naav le ntawd.
“Yog mej pum zeg noog nyob sau ntoo lossis huv aav kws tug puj noog tseem puag qai lossis puag mivnyuas, mej tsi xob tua tug puj.
Mej muab tau cov mivnyuas, tabsis mej yuavtsum tso tug puj moog, yog mej ua le ntawd, mej txhaj noj qaab nyob zoo hab muaj sa nyob ntev.
“Thaus mej ua tsev tshab, mej yuavtsum xov puagncig lub ruv tsev tug npoo, tuabneeg txhaj tsi poob hab tuag, mej txhaj tsi tau ris lub txim ntawd.
“Tsi xob cog lwm yaam qoob rua huv mej dlaim teb txiv maab, yog mej cog ob yaam sis xyaw, tug TSWV yuav txwv tsi pub mej dle tej txiv maab lossis sau tej qoob kws mej cog xyaw ntawd.
“Mej tsi xob muab nyuj hab neeg luav lug ua ib nkawg hai tuab raab khais laij teb.
“Mej tsi xob naav tej tsoog tsho kws muab xuv plaub yaaj hab xuv maaj lug ntus ua ke.
“Mej yuavtsum ntxhoo ntxhuav rua ntawm dlaim ntaub kws mej npua plaub ceg kaum.
“Yog leejtwg yuav tau quaspuj hab tom qaab kws nwg nrug tug quaspuj ntawd pw taag, nwg tsi nyam tug quaspuj ntawd;
hab nwg lam has tas tug quaspuj tsi yog nkaujxwb, nwg tub ntxag hluas nraug ua ntej obtug sis yuav lawm.

“Yog muaj le ntawd, tug ntxhais nam hab txiv yuavtsum nqaa dlaim ntaub pua chaw kws lu ntshaav moog ua povthawj rua cov txwjlaug huv tsev tu plaub huv lub nroog has tas, obtug tug ntxhais tseem yog nkaujxwb.
Tug ntxhais leej txiv has rua cov txwjlaug tas, ‘Kuv muab kuv tug ntxhais qua rua tug txivneej nuav, tabsis nwg tsi nyam kuv tug ntxhais.

Nwg lam has tas thaus nwg yuav kuv tug ntxhais, kuv tug ntxhais tub xub ntxag hluas nraug lawm, tabsis mej saib dlaim ntaub pua chaw kws lu ntshaav nuav; yog dlaim kws qha has tas kuv tug ntxhais tsi tau ntxag dlua hluas nraug.’
Ces cov txwjlaug huv lub nroog ca le muab tug txivneej ntawd nplawm;

hab puab muab nwg nplua ib puas dlaim nyaj lug khu tug ntxhais nam hab txiv rua qhov tug txivneej ntawd ua rua cov Yixalayees tej ntxhais poob ntsejmuag heev. Tug txivneej ntawd yuavtsum yuav tug quaspuj, hab tsi pub nwg nrauj moog taag simneej.
“Tabsis yog has tas, qhov kws tug txivneej has ntawd yeej muaj tseeb tag, hab yog tsi muaj povthawj has tas, tug ntxhais tseem yog nkaujxwb,

ces puab ca le coj tug ntxhais tawm huv nam txiv tsev moog rua saab nrau qhovrooj, ca cov txivneej kws nyob huv lub nroog muab pobzeb ntaus tug ntxhais ntawd kuas tuag, rua qhov thaus nwg tseem nrug nwg nam nwg txiv nyob, nwg tau ntxag hluas nraug ua ntej yuav quasyawg, ua rua tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees poob ntsejmuag. Mej ua le ntawd txhaj tshem tau tej kev phem kev qas tawm huv mej moog.

“Yog nteg tau ib tug txivneej, thaus nwg nrug lwm tug txivneej tug quaspuj pw, yuavtsum muab tug hluas nraug hab tug quaspuj ntawd tua povtseg huv tuabsi. Mej ua le ntawd txhaj tshem tau tej kev phem kev qas tawm huv mej moog.
Yog nteg tau ib tug txivneej huv nroog, vim nwg moog nrug tug hluas nkauj kws luas tub qhab lawm pw.

Mej ca le coj obtug tawm moog rua saab nrau ntug nroog hab muab pobzeb ntaus kuas obtug tuag huv tuabsi. Tug ntxhais tuag, vim nwg nyob huv nroog hab nwg tsi qw thov luas paab. Tug hluas nraug tuag, vim nwg moog ntxag tug ntxhais kws luas tub qhab lawm. Mej ua le ntawd txhaj tshem tau tej kev phem kev qas huv mej moog.
“Yog has tas, muaj ib tug txivneej moog ntsib ib tug ntxhais kws luas tub qhab lawm, nwg ca le muab mos tom xubtsuag, ces tsuas muab tug txivneej tua povtseg xwb;
tsi xob ua le caag rua tug ntxhais, rua qhov nwg tsi tau ua txhum kws tsimnyog muab nwg tua. Rooj plaub nuav txav txim ib yaam le ob tug txivneej sis ntaus kws ib tug muab ib tug ntaus tuag lawm.
Rua qhov tug txivneej ntawd moog mos tug ntxhais kws luas tub qhab lawm nyob dleb nroog, txawm yog tug ntxhais ntawd qw thov tuabneeg paab los tsi muaj leejtwg nov hab paab nwg.
“Yog muaj ib tug txivneej moog mos tug ntxhais kws luas tsi tau qhab,

tug txivneej ntawd yuavtsum them tsib caug dlaim nyaj rua tug ntxhais ntawd nam hab txiv, hab nwg yuav tug ntxhais ntawd ua quaspuj, rua qhov nwg txhobtxwm yuam tug ntxhais ntawd. Tsi pub nwg nrauj tug quaspuj ntawd moog taag simneej le.
“Tsi pub leejtwg nrug nwg txiv tug quaspuj pw, rua qhov ua le ntawd rhuav leej txiv ntsejmuag heev.
“Tug txivneej kws luas muab saam lossis txav chaw xis lawm, tsi muaj feem koom tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg.
“Tsi pub tug mivnyuas tsaub lossis nwg caajceg muaj feem koom nrug tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg, txawm yog tom qaab kaum tam tuabneeg los tsi pub le.
“Tsi pub cov Amoos lossis cov Mau-am lossis ib tug ntawm ob tsaav tuabneeg nuav caajceg muaj feem koom nrug tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg, txawm yog tom qaab kaum tam tuabneeg los tsi pub le.

Rua qhov thaus mej tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug hlaa puab lub tebchaws, puab tsi kaam muab zaub mov rua mej noj hab muab dlej rua mej haus, puab tseem ndlav Npe-aus tug tub Npala-aas kws nyob huv lub nroog Pethaus peg tebchaws Mexuputamias tuaj foom phem rua mej hab.
Tabsis tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsi noog Npala-aas tej lug, nwg txhaj muab tej lug kws foom phem hloov ua koob moov rua mej, vim nwg hlub mej.
Tam twg kws mej tseem ua ib tsaav tuabneeg nyob, mej tsi xob paab cov tuabneeg ntawd lossis txhawb kuas puab vaammeej le.
“Tabsis mej tsi xob tso cov Edoos tseg, rua qhov puab yog mej cov kwvtij. Mej tsi xob tso cov tuabneeg Iziv tseg, rua qhov mej tub tau nyob huv puab lub tebchaws ib zag lawm.
Tom qaab kws dlhau peb tam tuabneeg lawm, ob tsaav tuabneeg nuav caajceg muaj feem koom nrug tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg.
“Thaus mej taabtom sis tua nyob huv lub yeej, mej yuavtsum txuag tsi pub kuas muaj ib yaam dlaabtsi ua rua mej tsi huv.
Yog muaj ib tug txivneej nyob huv yeej ua npau suav nrug quaspuj pw, ua rua nwg lub rig ntub hab tsi huv, nwg yuavtsum tawm moog nyob saab nrau ntug yeej.
Thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, nwg yuavtsum ntxuav nwg lub cev kuas huv, ces thaus nub poob qho lawm, nwg maam le rov lug rua huv lub yeej.
“Mej yuavtsum tshwj ib thaaj chaw rua saab nrau ntug yeej, mej txhaj tau chaw moog tawm rooj.
Mej cov tubrog txhua tug nyag yuavtsum muaj nyag ib raab toomtxhob lossis ib raab hlau nrug nraim, thaus mej moog tawm rooj, mej txhaj tau siv khawb qhov faus.

Mej yuavtsum tu mej lub yeej kuas huv si, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv nrug nraim mej nyob, tsomkwm mej hab paab kuas mej tua yeej mej cov yeebncuab. Tsi xob ua ib yaam dlaabtsi tsi huv kws ua rua tug TSWV tso mej tseg.”
“Yog muaj ib tug qhev tsiv nwg tug tswv tuaj cuag mej, kuas mej paab nwg, mej tsi xob muab nwg xaa rov qaab moog rua tug tswv.
Ca nwg nrug mej nyob huv mej tej nroog lub kws nwg nyam nyob, hab mej tsi xob tsimtxom nwg.
“Tsi pub cov Yixalayees ib tug quaspuj lossis txivneej moog ua namndlav txivndlav nyob rua huv tsev teev mlom,

hab tsi pub kuas coj cov nyaj kws nwg moog ua namndlav lossis txivndlav tau lug, tuaj tso rua huv tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub Tuamtsev lawv le nwg coglug lawm. Tug TSWV ntxub txujkev ua namndlav txivndlav le ntawd.
“Thaus mej qev nyaj lossis txais zaub mov hab lwm yaam rua koj ib tug kwvtij Yixalayees, mej tsi xob tsub paaj rua nwg them.

Yog mej qev nyaj rua tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, mej tsub paaj rua nwg them los tau, tabsis mej tsi xob tsub paaj rua mej cov kwvtij Yixalayees them, mej yuavtsum ua lawv le txuj kevcai nuav, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv txhaj foom koob moov rua txhua yaam kws mej ua huv lub tebchaws kws nwg muab rua mej.
“Thaus mej coglug rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej tsi xob rhuav tej lug cog tseg ntawd, tug TSWV yeej tsi tseev le, yog mej rhuav ces mej ua txhum.
Yog mej tsi tau coglug rua tug TSWV, mej yeej tsi muaj txim,
Tabsis yog mej zoo sab coglug rua tug TSWV lawm, mej yuavtsum ua kuas tav.
“Thaus mej moog txug ntawm luas tej vaaj txiv maab txiv ntoo, mej dle tau noj, tabsis tsi xob dle ris lug tsev.
Thaus mej moog txug ntawm luas tej teb npleg, mej dle tau tej naab nplej noj, tabsis tsi xob muab lag hlais.

“Yog ib tug txivneej twg yuav quaspuj lawm, tabsis tom qaab ntawd nwg tsi xaav yuav nwg tug quaspuj, rua qhov nwg pum tug quaspuj ntawd ua tej yaam tsi hum nwg sab,  ces nwg ca le sau ib dlaim ntawv nrauj rua tug quaspuj, has kuas tug quaspuj tawm huv nwg tsev moog.
Tug quaspuj ntawd moog yuav dlua lwm tug quasyawg,
yog tug quasyawg tshab los tsi xaav yuav nwg hab, tug quasyawg tshab ca le ua ntawv nrauj rua nwg, hab kuas nwg tawm moog. Lossis yog has tas, tug quasyawg tshab ntawd tuag lawm.

Txawm le ntawd los thawj tug quasyawg tsi xob rov moog yuav tug quaspuj ntawd ib zag ntxiv le lawm. Nwg yuavtsum suav has tas, tug quaspuj ntawd yog tuabneeg tsi huv. Yog nwg rov yuav tug quaspuj ntawd dlua, yuav ua rua tug TSWV ntxub nwg heev. Mej tsi xob ua txhum le nuav nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej.

“Thaus muaj ib tug txivneej twg nyavnyuas yuav tau quaspuj, tsi xob coj tug ntawd moog tua rog, lossis tsi xob ca nwg ua ib yaam dlaabtsi rua numtswv; tabsis ca nwg nyob huv tsev ib xyoos, kuas nwg tug quaspuj muaj kev zoo sab.

“Thaus mej qev nyaj rua luas, mej tsi xob kuas luas muab luas lub zeb lossis txhib zeb saab sau lug yuam nqe, rua qhov lub zeb ntawd yog lub kws luas naj nub siv ua noj ua haus yug luas tsev tuabneeg.

“Yog leejtwg moog nyag nwg cov kwvtij Yixalayees ib tug lug ua nwg qhev, lossis muab muag moog ua luas qhev, yuavtsum muab tug kws nyag ntawd tua povtseg. Mej ua le ntawd txhaj tshem tau tej kev phem kev qas tawm huv mej moog.
“Yog mej cov muaj ib tug mob ruas, tug ntawd yuavtsum ua lawv le cov povthawj kuas nwg ua, hab ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv qha rua puab lawm.
Mej ncu ntsoov qhov kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau ua rua Milias, thaus mej tsiv tawm nraag tebchaws Iziv lug.
“Thaus mej qev ib yaam dlaabtsi rua ib tug twg, mej tsi xob moog rua huv nwg tsev hab muab lub tsho kws nwg muab yuam nqe rua mej,
mej nyob nrau zoov tog ca nwg maam nqaa tuaj rua mej xwb.
Yog tug ntawd txomnyem, mej tsi xob coj nwg lub tsho moog khaws ca ib mos;

tabsis txhua nub thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, mej ca le xaa rov qaab rua nwg, nwg txhaj tau naav pw. Yog mej ua le nuav, nwg txhaj yuav ncu mej txaj ntsig, hab tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav txaus sab rua mej.
“Tsi xob sej tej nqe zug kws cov tuabneeg txomnyem tuaj ua zug ntawm mej, tsi has mej tug kwvtij Yixalayees lossis tug tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nyob huv mej tej nroog,

mej ca le muab nqe zug rua tug ntawd txhua nub ua ntej lub nub poob qho, rua qhov nwg tog rawv tej nqe zug kws nwg ua nub ntawd. Yog mej tsi muab rua nwg, nwg yuav thov tug TSWV foom phem rua mej, ces mej yuav muaj txim.
“Yog mivnyuas ua txhum, tsi xob muab nam txiv tua theej mivnyuas, hab yog nam txiv ua txhum, tsi xob muab mivnyuas tua theej nam txiv; tug twg ua txhum tsuas ca tug ntawd tuag xwb.
“Mej tsi xob txwv cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws hab cov mivnyuas ntsuag txuj cai; hab tsi xob muab tug puj ntsuag lub tsho lug yuam tej nqe kws nwg txais.
Mej ncu ntsoov qhov kws mej tau ua luas qhev nraag tebchaws Iziv, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tau tso mej dlim; tub yog le ntawd, kuv txhaj qha kuas mej ua le nuav.

“Thaus mej sau qoobloo, yog mej sau tsi txhua qee teg nplej kws mej hlais, mej tsi xob rov moog sau dlua lawm; tseg tej ntawd rua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tej puj ntsuag, tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv txhaj yuav foom koob moov rua tej kws mej ua.
Thaus mej moog dle tej txiv ntoo roj thawj lwm taag, mej tsi xob rov moog dle tej ntxaib ntxiv lawm, tseg tej ntawd rua cov mivnyuas ntsuag, cov puj ntsuag hab tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws dle.
Thaus mej moog dle tej txiv maab thawj lwm taag, mej tsi xob rov moog dle tej ntxaib ntxiv lawm, tseg tej ntawd rua cov mivnyuas ntsuag, cov puj ntsuag hab tej tuabneeg txawv tebchaws dle.
Mej ncu ntsoov has tas, mej tau ua luas qhev nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv; tub yog vim le ntawd kuv txhaj qha kuas mej ua le nuav.
“Yog muaj ob tug Yixalayees muaj lug sis kom moog rua huv tsev tu plaub, tug txav txim phua has tas ib tug txhum hab ib tug tsi txhum,
ces yog yuav nplawm tug kws tau ua txhum, tug txav txim yuavtsum has kuas tug ntawd pw khwb rwg tsaiv maam le nplawm; hab tsuas pub nplawm lawv le nwg txujkev txhum xwb,
nplawm heev kawg, tsuas pub nplawm plaub caug nplawm xwb, tsi pub nplawm tshaaj ntawd. Yog mej nplawm tshaaj ntawd, yuav rhuav nwg ntsejmuag heev.
“Thaus mej taabtom muab nyuj moog tsuj nplej huv tshaav nplej, mej tsi xob muab naab looj nyuj qhovncauj.

“Yog muaj ob kwvtij nyob ua ib tse, ib tug moog yuav tau quaspuj, tabsis tug ntawd tuag thaus nwg tug quaspuj tseem tsi tau muaj tub, tug quaspuj ntawd tsi xob moog yuav lwm tug saab nrau, ca le muab nwg txis rua nwg tug quasyawg kws tuag lawm tug kwv xwb.
Thawj tug tub kws tug quaspuj ntawd yug, yuavtsum suav has tas yog tug quasyawg kws tuag lawm tug tub. Tug tuag lawm txhaj muaj caajceg nyob huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees moog lawm yaav tom ntej.

Tabsis yog has tas, tug quasyawg kws tuag lawm, tug kwv tsi kaam yuav tug quaspuj ntawd, ces tug quaspuj ca le moog has rua cov txwjlaug huv lub nroog ntawd tas, ‘Kuv tug quasyawg tug kwv tsi kaam yuav kuv; kuas kuv tug quasyawg kws tuag lawm muaj caajceg tseg rua huv tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees.’
Cov txwjlaug huv lub nroog ntawd hu tug kwv tuaj nug saib nwg puas yuav los tsi yuav. Yog has tas nwg tsi kaam yuav tug namtij ntawd,

ces kuas tug quaspuj ntawd moog muab tug kwv ib saab khau hle, nti quavncaug rua tug kwv lub ntsejmuag taabmeeg cov txwjlaug hab has tas, ‘Tug kws tsi ca nwg tug tijlaug muaj caajceg yeej tsimnyog raug le nuav.’
Cov Yixalayees yuav hu tug txivneej ntawd tsev tuabneeg has tas, ‘Tsev tuabneeg ntawm tug txivneej kws luas muab khau hle.’
“Yog muaj ob tug txivneej sis ntaus, hab ib tug ntawm ob tug ntawd, tug quaspuj lug paab nwg tug quasyawg, yog tug quaspuj ntawd xyaab teg moog chua lwm tug txivneej chaw xis,
mej ca le muab tug quaspuj ntawd txhais teg txav povtseg, tsi xob hlub nwg le.
“Mej tsi xob muab raab teev ntxo hab lub kawm kws tsi txwm luj rua luas.
Mej yuavtsum siv raab teev kws tsi ntxo hab lub kawm kws txwm lug luj xwb, mej txhaj yuav muaj sa ua neej nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej,
rua qhov tug TSWV ntxub cov tuabneeg kws ua tsi ncaaj le ntawd.
“Mej ncu ntsoov tej kws thaus mej tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug, cov Amalej tau ua rua mej lawm.
Puab tsi paub ntshai Vaajtswv, puab txhaj nyaag tuaj tom qaab tua mej, thaus kws mej qaug zug hab tsaug muas heev, hab puab tua mej cov tuabneeg kws nyob tom qaab tuag taag.

Yog le ntawd, thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab lub tebchaws rua mej hab ua rua mej nyob tso sab lug tsi ntshai mej tej yeebncuab kws nyob puagncig mej, mej ncu ntsoov muab cov Amalej tua kuas tuag taag, txhaj tsi muaj leejtwg ncu txug puab ntxiv lawm. Mej yuavtsum ncu ntsoov tej nuav!
“Thaus mej moog txeeb tau lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, hab mej ua zej ua zog nyob rua huv lawm,
mej suavdlawg nyag muab nyag thawj cov qoob ib yaam mivntsiv ntim rua huv kawm coj moog rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.

Mej moog cuag tug povthawj kws ua num lub sijhawm ntawd. Mej txhua tug nyag has nyag rua nwg tas, ‘Kuv thov leeg rua tug TSWV kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv tas, kuv tub tau lug nyob huv lub tebchaws kws nwg coglug muab rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm.’
“Tug povthawj yuav txais mej tej kawm qoob coj moog tso rua ntawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub thaaj.

Tom qaab ntawd, mej nyag yuav pav nyag tej lug rua tug TSWV has tas: ‘Kuv yawmkoob yog tuabneeg Alames, nwg tsiv ncig teb ncig chaw, nwg txhaj coj nwg tsev tuabneeg moog nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv. Thaus puab moog nyob nraag puab muaj tsawg, tabsis puab fuamvaam coob hab yog ib tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj zug heev.
Cov tuabneeg Iziv tsimtxom peb ua lwj ua lam hab yuam peb ua puab qhev,
peb txhaj le tsaa ncauj thov tug TSWV kws yog peb cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv paab peb. Nwg nov peb tej lug thov, pum peb tej kev txomnyem, tej kev khwv hab raug luas tsimtxom.
Nwg lub fwjchim hab tug zug luj zug nchaav tso peb dlim nraag tebchaws Iziv lug. Nwg ua tej txujci luj hab tseemceeb kws xaav tsi thoob rua peb pum.
Nwg coj peb lug nyob ntawm nuav hab muab lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob rua peb.
Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav kuv txhaj coj thawj cov qoob kws tug TSWV pub rua kuv ua tau ibtxha tuaj fij rua nwg.’ “Tom qaab ntawd muab cov qoobloo tso rua ntawm lub thaaj hab pehawm tug TSWV qhov ntawd.

Mej ca le zoo sab, rua qhov tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tub muab txhua yaam kws zoo pub rua mej hab mej tsev tuabneeg lawm. Ca cov Levis hab cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws kws nrug mej nyob, koom nrug mej zoo sab.

“Peb lub xyoo twg mej yuavtsum muab tej qoobloo kws yog ib feem kaum pub rua cov Levis, cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tej puj ntsuag ib zag; txawm yog puab yuav nrug paab twg pawg twg nyob los puab txhaj muaj noj muaj haus. Thaus mej ua tej nuav lawm,

mej has rua tug TSWV tas, ‘Kuv tej qoobloo tsi tshuav ib feem kaum kws yog koj tug nyob huv kuv tsev lawm. Kuv tub muab taagnrho rua cov Levis, cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tej puj ntsuag lawv le tej lug kws koj has kuas kuv ua lawm. Kuv ncu ntsoov ua lawv le koj tej kevcai kws qha txug ib feem kaum txhua nqai huv tuabsi, tsi tso ib nqai tseg le.

Thaus kuv muaj kev quaj ntsuag, kuv tsi noj tej qoobloo kws yog koj feem ib qho le; thaus kuv tsi tau ua kevcai ntxuav, kuv yeej tsi coj tej qoobloo tawm huv kuv tsev moog; hab kuv tsi muab tej ntawd coj moog fij rua tej tuag.  Tug TSWV, kuv noog koj lug hab ua txhua yaam lawv le kws koj qha txug ib feem kaum lawm.

Thov koj tug kws nyob qhov chaw dlawbhuv sau ntuj tsaa muag saib peb hab foom koob moov rua koj tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees; hab lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws koj muab rua peb lawv le koj tau coglug rua peb cov yawmkoob lawm.’
“Nub nua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv has kuas mej ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai txhua nqai huv tuabsi; mej ca le muab sab npuab hab ua lawv le ntawd kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws.
Nub nua mej tub leeg yuav tug TSWV ua mej tug Vaajtswv lawm. Mej coglug has tas mej yuav noog nwg lug, coj lawv le nwg tej kevcai txhua nqai, hab ua lawv le tej kws nwg has txhua lu huv tuabsi.
Nub nua tug TSWV yuav mej ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg lawv le tej lug kws nwg tau cog tseg rua mej lawm; hab nwg has kuas mej coj lawv le tej kevcai ntawd txhua nqai.

Nwg yuav ua kuas mej caj ua ib tsaav tuabneeg tseemceeb tshaaj lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nwg tsim huv tuabsi, hab mej yuav ua rua suavdlawg qhuas hab fwm nwg lub npe.  Mej yuav tau ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg rua mej lawm.”
Mauxes hab cov txwjlaug has rua cov Yixalayees has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tug TSWV txuj kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej lawm.
Nub kws mej yuav hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej, mej muab ob peb lub pobzeb luj lug teeb, hab muab moov sib leem rua txhua lub,
hab mej muab tej kevcai nuav sau rua ntawm cov pobzeb ntawd. Thaus mej moog rua huv lub tebchaws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws tug TSWV kws yog mej cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv tau coglug muab rua mej,
hab thaus mej hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tim lawm, mej muab cov pobzeb ntawd teeb rua sau lub Roob Enpales lawv le nub nua kuv has rua mej, hab muab moov sib leem rua.
Mej muab pobzeb teeb ua ib lub thaaj fij khoom rua tug TSWV, tsi xob muab cuabyeej hlau txaug cov pobzeb ntawd,
rua qhov cov pobzeb kws mej muab ua lub thaaj rua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, yuavtsum tsi pub muab cuabyeej hlau txaug le, tom qaab ntawd mej maam hlawv tau khoom fij rua sau lub thaaj,
hab mej muab tej khoom kws fij ua kev sis raug zoo, hab noj zoo sab taabmeeg tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv nyob qhov ntawd.
Mej sau Vaajtswv txuj kevcai txhua nqai kuas meej rua ntawm cov pobzeb ntawd.”
Mauxes hab cov povthawj has rua cov Yixalayees tas, “Mej ca le nyob tuabywv hab noog kuv has, nub nua mej tau ua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tsaav tuabneeg lawm;
yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum noog tug TSWV lug, hab ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej lawm.”
Nub ntawd Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees has tas,
Thaus mej suavdlawg hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tid lawm, kuas xeem Xime-oos, Levis, Yudas, Ixakhas, Yauxej hab Npeenyamees moog sawv sau lub Roob Kelixees foom koob moov rua cov pejxeem.
Hab kuas xeem Lunpees, Khas. Aseles, Xenpuloos, Daas hab Nathalis moog sawv sau lub Roob Enpales foom phem rua cov pejxeem.
Cov Levis yuav has nrov nrov rua cov Yixalayees has tas,

“Yog leejtwg puab mlom, tsi has mlom pobzeb, mlom ntoo, lossis mlom tooj hab moog pe tej mlom ntawd nraim nkoog; Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd, rua qhov tug TSWV ntxub cov tuabneeg pe mlom le ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg saib tsi taug nwg nam nwg txiv, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg naam dlhau nwg cov kwvtij tug nrimteb, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg dlaag cov tuabneeg dligmuag moog yuam kev, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg yuam cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws, cov mivnyuas ntsuag hab tej puj ntsuag txuj cai, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg ntxag nwg txiv tug quaspuj, rhuav nwg txiv ntsejmuag, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg ntxag tej tsaj, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg ntxag nwg tug muam, tsi has koom nam tsi koom txiv lossis koom txiv tsi koom nam, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg ntxag nwg nam tais, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg nyag tua tuabneeg, tsi muaj leejtwg paub, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg ca luas ndlav nwg moog tua tug tuabneeg kws tsi muaj txim tuag, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”
“Yog leejtwg tsi ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej kevcai nuav, Vaajtswv yuav foom phem rua tug ntawd.” Taagnrho cov Yixalayees yuav thooj txhij teb has tas, “Amees!”

“Yog mej noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug hab ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, tug TSWV yuav tsaa mej ua tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj fwjchim luj dlua lwm tsaav tuabneeg huv nplajteb nuav.
Yog mej noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug, mej yuav tau tej koob moov nuav:
“Tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua mej tej nroog hab tej laj teb.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov kuas mej muaj tubki, muaj nyuj, muaj yaaj coob hab muaj qoobloo ntau.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua mej tej qoobloo hab tej zaub mov kws mej khwv tau lug.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom koob moov rua txhua yaam kws mej ua.
“Tug TSWV yuav ua rua mej cov yeebncuab swb thaus puab tuaj tua mej. Puab ua ke tuaj tua mej, tabsis puab yuav tawg ua saab ua sua rov qaab.
“Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav foom koob moov rua tej kws mej ua hab pub kuas mej tau nplej ntau puv txhaab. Nwg yuav foom koob moov rua lub tebchaws kws nwg muab rua mej lawm.
“Yog mej noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug hab ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai, tug TSWV yuav ca mej ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg lawv le nwg tau coglug tseg lawm.
Txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob thoob nplajteb yuav pum has tas, tug TSWV tub xaiv mej lug ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg lawm, puab suavdlawg yuav ntshai mej.
Tug TSWV yuav pub kuas mej muaj tubki, muaj nyuj hab muaj qoobloo ntau nyob huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV tau coglug rua mej cov yawmkoob has tas, nwg yuav muab rua mej.
Tug TSWV yuav qheb rooj ntug tso naag lug lawv caij lawv nyoog hab foom koob moov rua tej kws mej ua, mej yuav muaj qev rua ntau lub tebchaws, tabsis mej yuav tsi tau moog txais luas.

Yog mej ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai txhua nqai kws kuv qha rua mej, tug TSWV yuav tsaa mej ua ntau tsaav tuabneeg tug thawj, tsi yog ua tug kws lawv luas qaab; yog mej ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, tej kws mej ua yuav vaammeej.
Tabsis mej yuavtsum tsi xob tso tej kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej lossis moog pe luas tej Vaajtswv.
“Yog mej tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug, tsi muab sab npuab nwg, hab tsi ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, ces mej yuav raug tej kev phem nuav.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom phem rua mej tej nroog hab tej laj teb.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom phem rua mej tej nplej hab tej zaub mov kws mej khwv tau lug.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom kuas mej tsi muaj tubki coob, tej qoobloo tsi zoo hab tej nyuj tej yaaj tsi fuamvaam.
“Tug TSWV yuav foom phem rua txhua yaam kws mej ua.
“Yog mej ua kev phem kev qas hab tso tug TSWV tseg, nwg yuav tso kev puamtsuaj, kev covnyom, hab kev ntxhuv sab lug rua txhua yaam kws mej ua, moog txug nub kws mej raug puamtsuaj taag.
“Nwg yuav tso kaab mob ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj rua mej, moog txug nub kws mej puamtsuaj taag rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej yuav moog nyob ntawd.

Tug TSWV yuav tso mob phem, mob rwj hab mob npaws lug rua mej; nwg yuav ua kuas muaj ntuj qhua teb nkig hab tso cua nplawm mej tej qoobloo kuas qhuav taag. Tej siv npug nuav yuav lug raug mej moog txug nub kws mej tuag taag.
Yuav tsi muaj naag lug rua mej lub tebchaws, mej lub tebchaws yuav qhuav hab tawv cuag hlau.
Tug TSWV yuav tsi tso naag lug, tabsis nwg yuav tso moov aav hab xuabzeb sau ntuj lug rua mej, moog txug thaus mej tuag taag.

“Tug TSWV yuav ca mej cov yeebncuab tuaj tua yeej mej. Mej yuav ua ib paab moog tua yeebncuab, tabsis mej yuav swb hab tsiv ua saab ua sua. Thaus txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob nplajteb pum mej raug tej xwm nuav puab yuav ntshai tshee nyo.
Thaus mej tuag, tej noog hab tej tsaj nruab nraag yuav noj mej lub cev, hab yuav tsi muaj leejtwg lawv tej tsaj ntawd kuas tsiv.
Tug TSWV yuav ua rua mej mob rwj, ib yaam le nwg ua rua cov Iziv lawm. Nwg yuav ua kuas mej lub cev tawg pleb, mob txhaab qawj ua paug mag, hab txob thoob ib ce khu tsi zoo le.
Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas mej lub tswvyim pluj xaav tsi tawm dlaabtsi le; nwg yuav ua kuas mej qhovmuag faam hab tsi pum qaab ua dlaabtsi.

Txawm yog nruab nub nrig los mej yuav moog kev ib yaam le tej tuabneeg dligmuag. Mej yuav nrhav tsi tau txuj hauv kev moog. Tej kws mej ua yuav tsi vaammeej. Luas yuav fuab mej tej khoom, hab tsimtxom mej taag moog le, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj paab mej.
“Mej qhab tau luas ib tug ntxhais los lwm tug yuav tuaj txeeb yuav. Mej ua tau tsev los mej yuav tsi tau nyob, mej cog tau txiv maab los mej yuav tsi tau noj.

Luas yuav muab mej tej nyuj tua taabmeeg mej los mej yuav tsi tau noj. Luas yuav tuaj caab mej tug neeg luav taabmeeg mej, hab tsi xaa rov qaab rua mej, luas yuav tuaj muab mej tej yaaj tej tshis coj moog pub mej cov yeebncuab, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg tuaj paab mej.
Luas yuav taabmeeg coj mej tej tub tej ntxhais moog ua cov tuabneeg txawv tebchaws qhev. Mej yuav naj nub tog saib kev ntsoov, tabsis tsi pum luas xaa mej tej mivnyuas rov lug le.
Lwm tsaav tuabneeg yuav tuaj txeeb mej tej qoobloo kws mej ua khwv khwv, kuas mej tsi tau noj, mej tseem yuav raug luas tsimtxom hab quab yuam taag moog le.
Mej raug luas tsimtxom le ntawd, yuav ua rua mej sab ntsws puag taag.
Tug TSWV yuav ua kuas mej mob rwj ntawm hauvcaug, ntawm txhais ceg hab thoob plawg sau taubhau ti huv kutaw ua paug mag khu tsi zoo le.

“Tug TSWV yuav coj mej hab mej tug vaajntxwv moog nyob lwm lub tebchaws kws mej hab mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau moog nyob dlua le. Nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd, mej yuav pe luas tej vaajtswv kws muab ntoo hab pobzeb ua.
Cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv tej tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab mej ntab moog nyob, yuav xaav tsi thoob tej kws tug TSWV ua rua mej; puab yuav luag mej plig hab txobthuam mej.
“Mej cog qoobloo ntau, tabsis sau tau tsawg, rua qhov yuav muaj kooj txomfaav noj mej tej qoob.
Mej cog txiv maab hab tu zoo heev, tabsis mej yuav tsi tau dle tej txiv hab tsi tau haus tej cawv txiv maab, rua qhov kaab muab tej maab noj taag lawm.
Mej cog txiv ntoo roj thoob mej lub tebchaws, tabsis mej tsi tau roj, rua qhov tej txiv zeeg taag lawm.
Mej muaj tub muaj ntxhais, tabsis puab yuav tsi nrug mej nyob, rua qhov luas yuav nteg puab moog.
Kaab yuav noj mej tej ntoo hab mej tej qoobloo kws nyob huv mej lub tebchaws taag.
“Lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob huv mej lub tebchaws yuav muaj fwjchim luj zuj zug, tabsis mej yuav poob fwjchim zuj zug.
Puab yuav muaj nyaj qev rua mej, tabsis mej yuav tsi muaj nyaj qev rua puab. Thaus kawg puab yuav tswjfwm mej.
“Tej kev siv kev npug nuav yuav lug raug mej, moog txug thaus mej puamtsuaj taag, rua qhov mej tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug, hab tsi ua lawv le tej kevcai kws tug TSWV qha rua mej.
Tej xwmtxheej nuav yog lub cim kws qha txug Vaajtswv txujkev txav txim rua mej hab mej tej xeebntxwv moog taag ibtxhis le.
Tug TSWV tub foom koob moov rua tej kws mej ua lawm, tabsis mej tsi muab sab npuab hab mej tsi muaj lub sab dlawb paug pehawm nwg.

Tug TSWV yuav tso mej cov yeebncuab tuaj yuam mej ua puab qhev, mej yuav tshaib plaab, nqhes dlej, labqaab hab mej yuav ntshaw ib puas tsaav yaam. Tug TSWV  yuav muab tug quabtwg hlau kws nyaav heev lug tso rua sau mej cejdlaab, moog txug thaus kws mej puamtsuaj taag.
Tug TSWV yuav ca lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob tim qaab ntuj kawg tuaj tawmtsaam mej, yog tsaav tuabneeg kws mej tsi paub puab tej lug. Puab yuav yaa ib yaam le dlaav tuaj tawmtsaam mej.
Tsaav tuabneeg ntawd yuav tsi taabncuab hab tsi txuag leejtwg, tsi has tug laug lossis tug hluas le.
Puab yuav noj mej tej tsaj txhu hab mej tej qoob taag, mej yuav tuag tshaib. Puab yuav tsi tseg mej tej nplej, cawv txiv maab, roj txiv ntoo, nyuj lossis yaaj rua mej le; ces mej yuav tuag taag.
Puab yuav tuaj tua txhua lub nroog huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej; tej chaw tsomfaaj kws sab hab tej ntsaa yeej kws mej tso sab rua los yuav pob puag taag.
“Thaus mej cov yeebncuab tuaj vij mej tej nroog, mej yuav tshaib plaab heev, mej yuav noj mej tej mivnyuas kws tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv muab rua mej.

Txawm yog tug txivneej kws muaj sab dlawb sab zoo los thaus cov yeebncuab tuaj vij ntawd, nwg yuav tsi hlub hab tsi taabncuab leejtwg le. Nwg yuav noj nwg cov mivnyuas ib tug, nwg yuav tsi faib rua nwg tej kwvtij lossis nwg tug quaspuj kws nwg hlub, lossis nwg lwm tug mivnyuas noj le, rua qhov tsi muaj zaub mov noj lawm.

Txawm yog tug quaspuj kws muaj lub sab dlawb sab zoo, hab muaj txag npluanuj, tsi tau taug kev moog kutaw le los nwg yuav ua ib yaam le ntawd. Thaus yeebncuab tuaj vij nwg lub nroog, nwg yuav tshaib plaab heev vim tsi muaj zaub mov noj le, nwg yuav muab nwg tug mivnyuas mog noj ntsag tu. Nwg yuav tsi faib rua nwg tug quasyawg kws nwg hlub lossis nwg lwm tug mivnyuas noj le.
“Yog mej tsi noog hab tsi ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug qha kws sau tseg rua huv phoo ntawv nuav, hab yog mej tsi fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lub npe kws dlawbhuv,
ces nwg yuav tso tej kaab mob kws khu tsi zoo hab tej sub tawg sub ntshaa lug rua mej hab mej tej tubki.
Nwg yuav tso tej kaab mob phem kawg nkaus kws mej pum thaus mej nyob nraag tebchaws Iziv lug raug mej, mej yuav khu tsi zoo le.
Tug TSWV tseem yuav tso ntau yaam kaab mob hab sub tawg sub ntshaa kws tsi tau teev tseg rua huv phoo ntawv kws sau Vaajtswv tej kevcai nuav, lug rua mej kuas mej puamtsuaj taag.
Txawm yog mej yuav fuamvaam coob le cov nubqub sau nruab ntug los tshuav qee leej seem xwb, rua qhov mej tsi noog tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv lug.
Tug TSWV txaus sab pub rua mej vaammeej hab fuamvaam coob le caag, nwg pum zoo yuav rhuav kuas mej puamtsuaj le ntawd. Nwg yuav ntab mej tawm huv lub tebchaws kws nwg muab rua mej.
“Tug TSWV yuav ntab mej moog nyob ua saab ua sua rua ntau lub tebchaws thoob qaab ntuj. Mej yuav moog pe luas tej vaajtswv kws muab ntoo hab pobzeb ua kws mej hab mej cov yawmkoob tsi tau pe dlua le.
Huv tej tebchaws kws mej moog nyob ntawd, mej yuav tsi muaj kev kaaj sab, hab tsi muaj aav ua mej tug le, tug TSWV yuav ua rua mej ntshai tshee nyo, qaug zug hab taag kev ca sab.
Mej lub neej yuav naj nub muaj kev ntxhuv sab, nruab nub mo ntuj los mej ntshai, hab tsi paub sov mej lub neej yuav xaus thaus twg.
Tej kws mej pum yuav ua rua mej lub sab ntshai tshee nyo. Thaus sawv ntxuv mej xaav kuas yog yuav tsaus ntuj, thaus yuav tsaus ntuj los mej xaav kuas yog thaus sawv ntxuv.

Txawm yog tug TSWV  has tas nej yuav tsi rov moog nraag tebchaws Iziv ntxiv lawm los tug TSWV yuav muab nkoj xaa mej moog. Thaus mej nyob nraag, mej yuav muab mej muag rua mej cov yeebncuab ua puab qhev los tsi muaj leejtwg yuav mej le.”

Ntawm nuav yog tej lug cog tseg kws tug TSWV kuas Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees thaus puab tseem nyob huv tebchaws Mau-am; cov lug cog tseg nuav yog has ntxiv rua cov kws tug TSWV has rua puab ntawm Roob Xinais.
Mauxes hu cov Yixalayees tuaj hab has rua puab tas, “Mej tub pum yaam kws tug TSWV ua rua Falaus, nwg cov numtswv hab nwg lub tebchaws.
Mej tub pum tej kev siv kev npug, hab tej txujci tseemceeb kws tug TSWV ua lawm.
Tabsis lug txug rua naj nub nua, tug TSWV tseem tsi tau pub mej totaub txug tej kws mej pum taag lug lawm.
Thaus tug TSWV coj mej lug hlaa taj suabpuam tau plaub caug xyoo ntawd, mej tej rig tsho hab tej khau tub tsi ndluag le.
Mej tsi muaj mov noj, tsi muaj cawv txiv maab lossis cawv ntxws haus los tug TSWV tseem npaaj txhua yaam ntawd pub rua mej tau noj tau haus, mej txhaj paub has tas nwg yog mej tug Vaajtswv.
Thaus peb lug txug ntawm nuav, Vaajntxwv Xihoos kws kaav lub nroog Hesenpoos hab Vaajntxwv Aunkas kws kaav lub tebchaws Npasaas tau tuaj tua peb, tabsis peb tua puab swb,
txeeb tau puab lub tebchaws, hab muab faib rua xeem Lunpees, xeem Khas hab ib nraab xeem Manaxes.
Yog le ntawd, mej yuavtsum muab sab npuab hab ua lawv le tug TSWV tej lug cog tseg nuav txhua lu huv tuabsi, tej kws mej ua txhaj yuav vaammeej.
“Nub nua taagnrho mej suavdlawg sawv taabmeeg tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, cov txwjlaug, cov numtswv, cov txivneej,
cov quaspuj mivnyuas hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob, cov kwv dlej hab txav tawg rua mej.
Nub nua mej tuaj sawv ntawm nuav, yog nrug tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv sis coglug, hab leeg has tas mej yuav ua lawv le tej lug nuav,
tug TSWV txhaj txais yuav mej ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg yuav ua mej tug Vaajtswv, lawv le nwg coglug tseg rua mej yawmkoob Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj lawm.
Tug TSWV tsi yog coglug rua mej cov kws nyob ntawm nuav xwb,
tabsis nwg coglug rua cov kws tsi nyob ntawm nuav hab mej tej xeebntxwv kws tseem tsi tau yug lug huv tuabsi.
“Mej paub has tas, peb nyob le caag nraag tebchaws Iziv, hab peb hlaa dlhau ntau lub tebchaws lug le caag.
Mej tub pum puab tej mlom phem qas kws puab muab ntoo, pobzeb, nyaj hab kub ua lawm.

Mej ceevfaaj nyob tsaam muaj tej tug txivneej, tej tug quaspuj, tej tsev tuabneeg lossis ib xeem twg kws nub nua tuaj sawv ntawm nuav tso tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tseg moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv. Yog mej ua le ntawd, mej yuav zoo le tug caag tshuaj ab kws tuaj huv mej tsaav tuabneeg.

Mej ceevfaaj tsi xob pub mej cov ntawm nuav, ib tug twg kws tau nov Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg lawm, xaav has tas ua le nwg lub sab phem xaav los nwg tseem yuav tau lub neej zoo. Tabsis yog nwg ua le ntawd yuav ua rua mej tug zoo tug phem puamtsuaj huv tuabsi.

Tug TSWV yuav tsi zaam txim rua tug ntawd. Tug TSWV txujkev chim kws kub cuag nplaim tawg yuav tawmtsaam tug ntawd, hab tej lug foom phem kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav yuav raug tug ntawd moog txug nub kws tug TSWV muab tug ntawd rhuav puamtsuaj taag.
Tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua tug ntawd, qha rua cov Yixalayees txhua xeem hab tug ntawd yuav raug tej lug foom phem kws teev rua huv phoo ntawv kws yog tug TSWV tej lug.
“Mej tej tubki yaav tom ntej hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob dleb yuav nov tej kev txomnyem hab kev siv kev npug kws tug TSWV tso lug rua mej lub tebchaws.

Mej lub tebchaws yuav qhuav ua leejfaaj hab ua ntsev; cog tsi tau ib yaam dlaabtsi, hab nroj tsuag los tuaj tsi taug le. Mej lub tebchaws yuav zoo ib yaam le lub nroog Xaudoos, lub nroog Kaumaulas, lub nroog Amas hab lub nroog Xenpauyees kws tug TSWV chim hab muab rhuav puamtsuaj taag lawm.
Tej tuabneeg thoob nplajteb yuav nug has tas, ‘Vim le caag tug TSWV ua le nuav rua puab lub tebchaws? Yog vim le caag Tug TSWV txhaj chim ua luaj?’
Luas yuav teb has tas, ‘Rua qhov tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg rhuav tej lug kws puab nrug tug TSWV kws yog puab cov yawmkoob tug Vaajtswv kws coj puab tsiv nraag tebchaws Iziv lug lawm.
Puab pe tej vaajtswv kws puab tsi tau pe dlua le, yog tej vaajtswv kws tug TSWV txwv tsi pub puab pe.
Vim le nuav tug TSWV txhaj chim heev rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab tso tej kev siv kev npug kws teev tseg rua huv phoo ntawv nuav lug rua puab lub tebchaws.
Tug TSWV npautawg heev, nwg txhaj muab puab ntab tawm huv puab lub tebchaws moog nyob rua luas tej tebchaws kws nwgnuav puab tseem nyob ntawd.’

“Muaj tej yaam kws tug TSWV kws yog peb tug Vaajtswv tsi qha rua leejtwg paub; tabsis nwg tub qha nwg tej kevcai rua suavdlawg, kuas peb hab peb tej xeebntxwv ua lawv le tej kevcai ntawd moog ibtxhis.”

Mauxes has tas, “Kuv ca mej xaiv saib, mej yuav tej lug foom koob moov lossis tej lug foom phem. Thaus muaj tej xwm nuav lug raug mej hab thaus tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv ntab mej moog nrug lwm tsaav tuabneeg nyob, mej yuav ncu txug tej kws kuv kuas mej xaiv nuav.
Yog mej hab mej tej tubki rov lug cuag tug TSWV, hab ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej kawg sab kawg ntsws,
tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav taabncuab mej. Nwg yuav coj mej tawm huv txhua lub tebchaws kws nwg ntab mej moog nyob rov lug, hab nwg yuav pub kuas mej lub neej rov vaammeej dlua.
Txawm yog mej tsiv moog nyob rua txhua ceg kaum ntuj lawm los tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav coj mej rov lug,
mej yuav tau kaav lub tebchaws kws thaus u mej cov yawmkoob nyob lug lawm. Tug TSWV yuav pub kuas mej fuamvaam hab vaammeej tshaaj mej cov yawmkoob.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav pub lub sab kws paub noog lug rua mej hab mej tej xeebntxwv, mej txhaj muab sab npuab tug TSWV hab hlub nwg kawg sab kawg ntsws, hab mej yuav nyob huv lub tebchaws ntawd moog le.
Nwg yuav muab tej lug foom phem nuav rua mej tej yeebncuab kws ntxub hab tsimtxom mej,
mej txhaj yuav noog nwg lug hab ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai txhua nqai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej.

Tug TSWV yuav pub kuas tej kws mej ua vaammeej; mej yuav muaj tubki hab muaj tsaj txhu coob ua npoj ntwg, hab mej tej teb yuav ntsu qoob. Tug TSWV yuav txaus sab ua kuas mej vaammeej ib yaam le nwg ua rua mej cov yawmkoob vaammeej,
tabsis mej yuavtsum noog nwg lug hab coj lawv le nwg tej kevcai kws sau rua huv phoo ntawv nuav txhua nqai huv tuabsi. Mej yuavtsum tig rov lug muab sab npuab tug TSWV kuas kawg sab kawg ntsws.
“Tej kevcai kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, mej tsi xob xaav has tas, nyuaj hab coj tsi tau.
Tej kevcai nuav tsi yog nyob sau ntuj. Tsi taag mej yuav nug has tas, ‘Leejtwg yuav nce moog muab lug rua peb, kuas peb txhaj nov hab coj lawv le ntawd?’
Tej kevcai ntawd tsi yog nyob saab ntug havtxwv tim u. Tsi taag mej yuav nug has tas, ‘Leejtwg yuav hlaa havtxwv moog muab lug rua peb, kuas peb txhaj nov hab coj lawv le ntawd.’
Tej kevcai ntawd nyob ntawm mej nuav ntaag. Mej yeej paub hab nyob huv mej lub sab, mej ca le ua lawv le ntawd.
“Nub nua kuv ca mej xaiv, saib mej yuav qhov phem lossis qhov zoo, mej yuav txujsa lossis kev tuag.

Yog has tas mej noog hab ua lawv le tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv  tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej, yog mej hlub nwg, noog nwg lug hab coj lawv le nwg tej kevcai, mej yuav vaammeej hab ua ib tsaav tuabneeg coob heev. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav foom koob moov rua lub tebchaws kws mej yuav moog nyob.
Tabsis yog mej tsi noog nwg lug, tsi ua lawv le nwg tej lug qha, hab ca luas coj mej moog pe luas tej vaajtswv,
nub nua kuv has rua mej tas, mej yuav raug kev puamtsuaj. Mej yuav tsi tau nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws mej yuav hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog tua hab nyob.

Nwgnuav kuv ca mej xaiv, saib mej yuav txujsa lossis yuav kev tuag, mej yuav tej lug foom koob moov lossis tej lug foom phem; kuv thov lub ntuj lub teb nrug ua timkhawv rua tej kws nub nua mej xaiv. Mej ca le xaiv txujsa.

Hlub tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, ua lawv le nwg tej lug qha hab muab sab npuab nwg. Mej hab mej tej xeebntxwv txhaj muaj sa nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua mej yawmkoob Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj lawm.”
Mauxes has rua cov Yixalayees tas,

“Nwgnuav kuv noobnyoog muaj ib puas neeg nkaum xyoo, kuv ua tsi taug mej tug thawj moog ntxiv lawm. Dlua le ntawd, tug TSWV has rua kuv tas, kuv yuav tsi tau hlaa tug dlej Yauladees moog rua saab tim u.

Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav moog ua mej ntej hab nwg yuav tua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws nyob tid, mej txhaj yuav ntaus tau puab lub tebchaws rua mej nyob; txij nuav moog Yausuas yuav ua mej tug thawjcoj, lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob tid puamtsuaj, ib yaam le nwg tau ua rua Xihoos hab Aunkas kws ua vaajntxwv kaav cov Amaules lub tebchaws puamtsuaj taag.
Tug TSWV yuav pub kuas mej moog tua yeej cov tuabneeg ntawd, hab mej yuavtsum muab puab tua kuas tuag taag lawv le tej lug kws kuv has rua mej lawm.
Mej yuavtsum ua sab tawv hab ua sab ruaj nreeg tsi xob ntshai cov tuabneeg ntawd. Tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv yuav nrug nraim mej, nwg yuav tsi ncaim mej lossis tso mej tseg le.”

Tom qaab ntawd, Mauxes hu Yausuas lug cuag nwg, hab nwg has rua Yausuas taabmeeg cov Yixalayees tas, “Koj ca le ua sab tawv hab ua sab ruaj nreeg tsi xob ntshai; koj yog tug yuav coj cov tuabneeg nuav moog tua lub tebchaws kws tug TSWV tau coglug tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav moog ua koj ntej hab nrug nraim koj. Nwg yuav tsi ncaim koj lossis tso koj tseg, koj tsi xob poob sab lossis ntshai.”
Mauxes sau Vaajtswv tej kevcai tseg hab muab rua cov povthawj kws saib lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg hab cov Yixalayees tej thawjcoj.
Mauxes has rua puab tas, “Xyaa lub xyoo twg kws yog txwm rua xyoo xuam nuj nqes, mej ca le nyeem phoo ntawv nuav rua cov Yixalayees suavdlawg noog, thaus mej ua Kevcai nyob Tsev Pheebsuab.
Thaus cov Yixalayees tuaj ua ke rua ntawm qhov chaw pehawm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv, mej ca le nyeem rua suavdlawg noog.

Mej ca le hu suavdlawg tsi has quaspuj txivneej, tug hlub tug yau hab lwm tsaav tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob tuaj huv tuabsi, suavdlawg txhaj nov hab fwm tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv hab muab sab npuab ua lawv le nwg tej lug.

Yog mej ua le ntawd, mej tej xeebntxwv kws tsi tau nov dlua tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej kevcai txhaj tau nov hab paub noog tug TSWV lug moog taag puab simneej kws nyob huv lub tebchaws kws mej yuav hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog tua hab txeeb nyob ntawd.”

Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas, “Koj yuav ua neej nyob tsi ntev lawm. Koj ca le hu Yausuas tuaj cuag koj hab coj nwg moog rua huv kuv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib, kuv yuav qha nwg.” Ces Mauxes hab Yausuas txawm moog rua huv lub Tsevntaub sis ntsib,
hab tug TSWV lug rua obtug pum nyob huv tauv fuab ntawm lub qhovrooj Tsevntaub.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas, “Tshuav tsi ntev koj yuav tuag, thaus koj tuag lawm, cov Yixalayees yuav tsi muab sab npuab kuv, puab yuav tsi ua lawv le tej lug kws kuv has rua puab. Puab yuav tso kuv tseg hab moog pe lwm tsaav tuabneeg tej vaajtswv huv lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav muab rua mej nyob.

Thaus muaj tej nuav tshwm lawm, kuv yuav chim rua puab; kuv yuav muab puab tso tseg, hab puab yuav raug kev puamtsuaj. Yuav muaj ntau yaam kev siv kev npug lug raug puab, thaus ntawd puab yuav paub has tas, qhov kws puab raug tej ntawd, vim kuv kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tsi nrug puab nyob lawm,
thaus ntawd kuv yuav tsi paab puab, rua qhov puab moog ua kev phem kev qas hab moog pe luas tej vaajtswv lawm.
“Koj ca le sau zaaj nkauj nuav tseg, hab qha rua cov Yixalayees, txhaj muaj lug kom puab tej kev txhum.

Kuv yuav coj puab moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws aav rog hab zoo qoob kws kuv tau coglug tseg rua puab cov yawmkoob lawm. Puab yuav muaj noj muaj haus txaus hab nyob tso sab lug huv lub tebchaws ntawd. Tabsis puab yuav ntxeev sab rua kuv hab moog pe luas tej vaajtswv. Puab yuav tso kuv tseg hab tsi ua lawv le kuv tej lug,

yuav muaj ntau yaam kev siv kev npug lug raug puab, tabsis puab tej xeebntxwv tseem yuav hu zaaj nkauj nuav tawmtsaam puab. Txawm yog kuv tseem tsi tau coj puab moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv coglug yuav muab rua puab los kuv tub paub puab lub sab lawm.”
Nub ntawd Mauxes txawm sau zaaj nkauj hab qha rua cov Yixalayees.

Tom qaab ntawd tug TSWV has rua Noos tug tub Yausuas tas, “Koj ca le ua sab tawv qhawv tsi xob ntshai. Koj yuav ua tug coj cov Yixalayees moog nyob huv lub tebchaws kws kuv tau coglug tseg yuav muab rua puab, hab kuv yuav nrug nraim koj.”
Mauxes sau Vaajtswv tej kevcai rua huv ntawv tseg, nwg sau txhua nqai tsi tseg ib nqais le.
Thaus nwg sau tav lawm, nwg has rua cov povthawj saib lub Phijxaab kws ntim Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg tas,

“Mej ca le coj Phoo Ntawv kws yog Vaajtswv tej Kevcai nuav moog tso rua ib saab ntawm lub Phijxaab kws ntim tug TSWV kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv tej lug cog tseg, ca nyob ntawd ua timkhawv kom nwg tsaav tuabneeg.

Kuv paub has tas, puab yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj hab ntxeev sab. Thaus kuv tseem ua neej nyob puab tub ntxeev sab hab tawmtsaam tug TSWV ntau zag lawm, tom qaab kuv tuag lawm ntshai puab hajyam yuav ntxeev sab ntxiv.
Mej ca le hu cov thawjcoj ntawm txhua xeem hab cov numtswv tuaj cuag kuv, kuv yuav qha tej lug nuav rua puab; kuv yuav thov lub ntuj lub teb ua timkhawv tawmtsaam puab tej kev txhum.

Kuv paub has tas thaus kuv tuag lawm, cov Yixalayees yuav ua kev phem kev qas, hab tsi kaam ua lawv le tej kws kuv tub qha rua puab lawm. Muaj ib nub puab yuav raug kev siv kev npug, rua qhov puab txhobtxwm ua tej kws tug TSWV txwv tsi pub puab ua, puab ua rua tug TSWV chim heev.”
Tom qaab ntawd Mauxes nyeem taagnrho zaaj nkauj rua cov Yixalayees noog.
“Lub ntuj noog kuv tej lug, lub nplajteb nov kuv has.

Kuv tej lug qha yuav poob lug ib yaam le naag, hab teev ib yaam le lub lwg dlej rua huv nplajteb. Kuv tej lug yuav poob ib yaam le lug naag tshauv rua tej qoobloo, hab ib yaam le kob naag lug rua sau tej nroj tsuag.
Kuv yuav qhuas tug TSWV lub npe, hab nwg tsaav tuabneeg yuav qhuas nwg lub fwjchim kws luj kawg nkaus.
“Tug TSWV yog lub pobzeb kws tiv thaiv mej, nwg yog tug kws zoo kawg nkaus, tej kws nwg ua yeej ncaaj nceeg; mej tug Vaajtswv yog tug ncaaj hab tseeb; nwg ua qhov yog hab qhov tseeb xwb.
Tabsis mej ua tsi ncaaj, tsi tsimnyog mej ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg, mej yog tsaav tuabneeg txhum hab dlaag.
Cov tuabneeg ruag hab tsi txawj xaav, puas tsimnyog mej ua le nuav rua tug TSWV? Nwg tsi yog mej Txiv, nwg tsi yog tug tsim mej, hab nwg tsi yog tug kws ua rua mej caj ua ib tsaav tuabneeg los?

“Ncu ntsoov tej xwmtxheej yaav taag lug, hab xaav txug tej tuabneeg ntau tam thaus u; ca le nug mej txiv kuas qha mej, saib muaj dlaabtsi tshwmsim, ca le nug tej laug, puab yuav pav yaav taag lug rua mej noog.
Tug TSWV kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus faib tebchaws rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg; nwg kuas nyag nyob muaj nyag nrim lawv le tej tsaav tuabneeg kws muaj coob lossis muaj tsawg.
Tabsis nwg xaiv Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv ua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.
“Nwg pum puab moog moog lug lug tom taj suabpuam kws qhuav qhawv hab cua ntsawj nrov vwg; tug TSWV hlub hab tsomkwm puab ib yaam le nwg txuag nwg lub qhovmuag.
Tug TSWV tsomkwm tsi pub cov Yixalayees poob, ib yaam le tug dlaav qha nwg tej mivnyuas yaa, Nwg muab nwg ob phaab tis txais tsi pub tej mivnyuas poob.
Tug TSWV tuab leeg coj nwg tsaav tuabneeg, nwg tsi yuav lwm tsaav tuabneeg tug vaajtswv paab.

“Nwg ca puab kaav tej qhov chaw sab, puab yuav tau noj tej qoobloo huv puab tej laj teb. Puab yuav tau haus tej zib ntaab ntawm tej pobtsuas, hab puab tej txiv ntoo roj yuav txi ncw ntawm thaaj aav kws muaj pobzeb.
Puab tej nyuj tej tshis yuav muaj kua mig ntau; puab muaj tej yaaj tej tshis hab tej nyuj, tej qeb hab tej cawv txiv maab kws zoo kawg nkaus.

“Tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg npluanuj, tabsis puab yog tuabneeg ntxeev sab; puab rog vim puab tau noj tau haus tsau npo. Puab tsi leeg paub Vaajtswv tug kws tsim puab, hab puab tso puab tug Cawmseej kws muaj fwjchim tseg.
Puab pe mlom, ua rua tug TSWV khib puab heev, puab ua kev phem kev qas ua rua tug TSWV npautawg rua puab.
Puab tua tsaj fij rua tej vaajtswv kws tsi yog vaajtswv, yog tej vaajtswv kws puab cov yawmkoob tsi tau pe dlua, tej dlaab ntawd cov Yixalayees tsi coj hab tsi tau pehawm dlua le.
Puab tsi ncu qaab puab tug Vaajtswv, tug Cawmseej kws muaj fwjchim, hab tug kws pub txujsa rua puab lawm.
“Thaus tug TSWV pum tej nuav, nwg npautawg kawg le, nwg txhaj tso nwg tej tub tej ntxhais tseg.
Tug TSWV has tas, ‘Kuv yuav tsi paab puab lawm, kuv yuav saib puas muaj xwm dlaabtsi lug raug puab, puab yog tuabneeg tawv ncauj, hab tsi ntseeg kuv.

Kuv chim rua puab vim puab tej mlom. Puab pe tej vaajtswv kws tsi yog Vaajtswv, ua rua kuv khib. Kuv yuav tso ib paab tuabneeg kws tsi muaj tebchaws tuaj zig kuas puab chim; hab tso ib tsaav tuabneeg ruag tuaj ua kuas puab khib.

Kuv txujkev chim yuav cig ib yaam le nplaim tawg hab yuav kub txhua yaam kws nyob huv nplajteb nuav. Cov nplaim tawg yuav kub moog kuas txug huv tubtuag teb hab yuav kub moog kuas ti rua huv qaab tivtxwv roob.
“ ‘Kuv yuav tso kev siv kev npug lug rua puab ib yaam taag ib yaam tuaj, hab tua kuv tej xub vug tawmtsaam puab.
Puab yuav tuag tshaib hab tuag mob tuag ntsaaj; puab yuav tuag taag rua tej kaab mob phem, kuv yuav tso tej tsaj qus lug tawmtsaam puab, hab tso tej naab muaj taug lug tum puab.

Yuav muaj tuabneeg raug nav ntaaj tuag pawg lug ntawm tej kev; tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv tsev yuav ntshai ua plhu thumxem taag, hab tej tub hluas ntxhais hluas yuav tuag taag; tej mivnyuas mog lossis tej laug kws dlawb hau paug los yuav tuag taag.
Kuv yuav ua kuas puab puamtsuaj huv tuabsi, yuav tsi muaj leejtwg ncu txug puab lawm.
Kuv yuav tsi pub puab cov yeebncuab khaav has tas, puab tua yeej kuv tsaav tuabneeg, tabsis yog kuv ua rua kuv tsaav tuabneeg puamtsuaj xwb.’
“Cov Yixalayees yog ib tsaav tuabneeg kws tsi txawj xaav, puab tsi muaj tswvyim le.
Puab tsi paub has tas yog le caag puab txhaj swb; Puab tsi totaub has tas vim le caag puab raug tej ntawd.

Vim le caag luas ib leeg tua yeej mej ib txheeb leej, hab vim le caag luas ob leeg tua yeej mej kaum txheeb leej? Tub yog tug TSWV kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv tso puab tseg lawm; puab tug Vaajtswv kws muaj fwjchim luj muab puab cob rua puab cov yeebncuab.
Puab cov yeebncuab yeej paub has tas, puab tej vaajtswv tsi muaj fwjchim npaum le cov Yixalayees tug Vaajtswv.
Puab cov yeebncuab ua kev phem kev qas ib yaam le cov tuabneeg huv lub nroog Xaudoos hab lub nroog Kaumaulas, ib yaam le tsob txiv maab kws txi txiv ab lom tuabneeg tuag,
ib yaam le cov cawv kws muab taug naab ua.
“Tug TSWV ncu ntsoov tej kws puab cov yeebncuab tau ua taag lug; Nwg tog txug sijhawm, ces nwg yuav rau txim rua puab.
Tug TSWV yuav pauj hab rau txim rua puab; nub kws puab raug kev puamtsuaj tub lug yuav txug, lub sijhawm ntawd tub lug ze lawm.
Tug TSWV yuav paab nwg tsaav tuabneeg, thaus nwg pum puab qaug zug. Nwg yuav taabncuab cov kws ua nwg teg num, thaus nwg pum puab coogtxuj lawm.
Thaus ntawd tug TSWV yuav nug nwg tsaav tuabneeg has tas, ‘Tej vaajtswv kws mej ca sab rua nyob qhov twg lawm?

Mej muab tej tsaj kws mej tua fij tej roj coj moog pub rua tej vaajtswv ntawd noj, hab muab cawv txiv maab fij rua tej vaajtswv ntawd. Ca le has kuas tej vaajtswv ntawd paab mej, hab kuas puab ca le lug cawm mej.

“ ‘Kuv tuab leeg xwb txhaj yog Vaajtswv; Tsi muaj dlua lwm tug vaajtswv lawm. Kuv ua kuas tuabneeg tuag hab kuv pub tau txujsa, kuv ua kuas nqaj to hab khu tau kuas zoo. Tsi muaj leejtwg txwv tau tej kws kuv ua ntawd le.
Kuv yog Vaajtswv tug kws muaj sa nyob, kuv tsaa teg coglug tseg has tas
kuv yuav huv kuv raab ntaaj kuas ci nplaag hab txav txim kuas ncaaj nceeg. Kuv yuav ua pauj rua kuv cov yeebncuab hab rau txim rua cov kws ntxub kuv.

Kuv cov xub vug yuav lu puab tej ntshaav, hab kuv yuav muab ntaaj tua txhua tug kws tawmtsaam kuv. Kuv yuav tsi tseg cov kws tuaj tawmtsaam kuv ib tug le; txawm yog cov kws raug mob hab cov kws nyob huv tsev lojcuj los yuav tuag taag.’

“Txhua tsaav tuabneeg thoob qaab ntuj, mej ca le qhuas tug TSWV tsaav tuabneeg, tug TSWV yuav rau txim rua txhua tsaav tuabneeg kws tuaj tua nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Nwg yuav ua pauj rua nwg cov yeebncuab hab zaam txim rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg.”
Mauxes hab Noos tug tub Yausuas nyeem zaaj nkauj nuav, cov Yixalayees txhua tug txhaj nov.
Thaus Mauxes qha Vaajtswv tej lug rua suavdlawg noog taag lawm,

Mauxes has tas, “Mej yuavtsum ua lawv le tej lug kws nub nua kuv qha rua mej lawm. Mej yuavtsum qha tej lug nuav rua mej tej mivnyuas, puab txhaj muab sab npuab hab ua lawv le Vaajtswv tej lug qha nuav txhua lu huv tuabsi.

Tej lug ntawd tsi yog tej kws tsi muaj hauvpaug hauvntsis; tabsis yog tej kws cawm tau mej txujsa. Mej yuavtsum coj lawv le ntawd, mej txhaj muaj sa nyob ntev huv lub tebchaws kws mej taabtom yuav hlaa tug Dlej Yauladees moog tua hab nyob ntawd.”
Nub ntawd tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas,

“Koj ca le nce moog rua sau tej Roob Anpalees huv tebchaws Mau-am kws saib ntsoov rua tim lub nroog Yelikaus; hab nce moog rua sau lub ncov roob Nenpaus, saib moog rua tim tebchaws Kana-aas kws kuv yuav muab rua cov Yixalayees nyob.
Koj yuav tuag rua sau lub roob ntawd ib yaam le koj tug tijlaug Aloos tuag rua sau lub Roob Haules,

rua qhov meb tsi noog kuv lug taabmeeg cov Yixalayees; hab thaus mej nyob ntawm cov qhovdlej Melinpas kws ze lub nroog Kades huv lub taj suabpuam Xees, meb ua saib tsi taug kuv taabmeeg cov Yixalayees.
Koj yuav tuaj dleb pum lub tebchaws Kana-aas xwb, tabsis koj yuav tsi tau moog nyob lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav muab rua cov Yixalayees.”
Mauxes kws yog Vaajtswv tug tuabneeg tej lug foom koob moov rua cov Yixalayees ua ntej nwg tuag.

Tug TSWV nqeg sau Roob Xinais lug; nwg sawv ib yaam le lub nub ci tuaj rua lub tebchaws Edoos, nwg tug dluab ci sau lub Roob Palaas tuaj rua nwg tsaav tuabneeg. Muaj kaum txheeb tug timtswv nrug nwg. Muaj nplaim tawg cig laam lug ntawm nwg saab teg xis.
Tug TSWV hlub nwg tsaav tuabneeg, hab nwg tsomkwm nwg cov tuabneeg. Peb txhaj txhus caug ndlua ntawm nwg kutaw hab ua lawv le nwg tej lug.
Peb ua lawv le tej Kevcai kws Mauxes qha rua peb, tej nuav yog tej kws tseemceeb heev rua peb tsaav tuabneeg.
Tug TSWV yuav ua Vaajntxwv kaav nwg tsaav tuabneeg Yixalayees. Thaus puab txhua xeem hab cov thawjcoj tuaj sis sau ua ke.
Mauxes has txug xeem Lunpees le nuav: “Txawm yog xeem Lunpees muaj tuabneeg tsawg los thov tsi xob pub kuas tu noob.”

Mauxes has txug xeem Yudas has tas: “Tug TSWV, thov koj noog puab tej lug thov; thov koj sau puab rov lug koom nrug lwm xeem ua ke. Tug TSWV thov koj tuaj puab tog hab paab puab tawmtsaam puab cov yeebncuab.”

Mauxes has txug xeem Levis le nuav: “Tug TSWV, thov koj qha xeem Levis kws yog koj cov tubkhai ncaaj nceeg kuas paub txhais lub Ulees hab lub Thumees. Koj tub sim puab sab ntawm Maxas, hab koj paub puab lub sab ntawm lub qhovdlej Melinpas lawm.
Puab muab sab npuab koj heev dlua puab muab sab npuab puab nam puab txiv, puab tej kwvtij lossis puab tej mivnyuas. Puab noog koj lug hab ua lawv le koj tej lug cog tseg.
Puab yuav qha koj tsaav tuabneeg ua lawv le koj tej kevcai; puab yuav tua tsaj fij rua sau koj lub thaaj.

Tug TSWV, thov paab kuas puab xeem muaj zug heev; thov koj txaus sab rua tej num kws puab ua. Thov rhuav puab tej yeebncuab moog dlu lug; thov tsi xob pub cov yeebncuab ntawd sawv taug lug tawmtsaam puab.”
Mauxes has txug xeem Npeenyamees le nuav: “Xeem nuav, yog xeem kws tug TSWV hlub hab tsomkwm; Tug TSWV zuv puab taag nub taag mo hab nrug nraim puab nyob.”
Mauxes has txug xeem Yauxej le nuav: “Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov kuas muaj naag lug rua puab lub tebchaws; hab muaj dlej txheem huv aav tuaj ua rua aav noo.
Thov tug TSWV foom koob moov rua puab lub tebchaws, kuas muaj tshaav ntuj ua rua puab tej txiv maab txiv ntoo txi ua nrw nab hab sav lawv caij lawv nyoog.
Thov kuas puab tej toj roob hauv peg kws nyob ibtxhis thaus u lug lawm, muaj txiv maab txiv ntoo txi puv toj puv peg.

Thov kuas puab lub tebchaws muaj ib puas tsaav yaam zoo, hab tau tug TSWV kws muaj sab zoo tej koob moov; Tug TSWV yog tug has lug huv tsob ntoo kws muaj nplaim tawg cig. Thov kuas xeem Yauxej tau tej koob moov nuav, rua qhov Yauxej yog nwg cov kwvtij tug thawjcoj.

Yauxej muaj zug ib yaam le tug txiv nyuj; nwg txwm kub yog kub nyuj qus. Ib tug kub yog Manaxes kws yog ntau txheeb leej tug zug, ib tug kub yog Efalayees kws yog kaum txheeb leej tug zug. Yauxej siv ob tug kub ntawd nrau lwm tsaav tuabneeg kuas tsiv tawm moog; nwg lawv puab tsiv moog ti qaab ntuj kawg.”

Mauxes has txug xeem Xenpuloos hab xeem Ixakhas le nuav: “Thov kuas xeem Xenpuloos kev ua laag ua luam huv havtxwv, kuas puab muaj txag npluanuj; hab thov kuas xeem Ixakhas muaj txag npluanuj nyob huv vaaj huv tsev.
Puab caw lwm tsaav tuabneeg tuaj rua sau puab tej roob tua tsaj fij lawv le puab tej kaab ke, puab muaj txag npluanuj, vim txujkev ua laag ua luam huv havtxwv hab lawv ntug havtxwv.”

Mauxes has txug xeem Khas has le nuav: “Ua Vaajtswv tsaug kws nwg ua rua xeem Khas lub tebchaws nthuav dlaav. Khas tog luas kev ib yaam le tug tsuv ntxhuav chua luas npaab kuas tu, lossis tev luas tawv taubhau yaws hlo.

Puab xaiv lub tebchaws kws zoo tshaaj ua puab tug; Puab tau tej kws yog cov thawjcoj feem. Thaus cov Yixalayees cov thawjcoj tuaj ua ke,  Xeem Khas noog tug TSWV tej lug hab ua lawv le nwg tej kevcai.”
Mauxes has txug xeem Daas le nuav: “Daas yog tug thaav tsuv ntxhuav kws dlha tej caws qa huv tebchaws Npasaas tuaj.”
Mauxes has txug xeem Nathalis le nuav: “Tug TSWV foom koob moov rua xeem Nathalis ntau kawg nkaus. Puab lub tebchaws txij ndlua ntawm Havtxwv Kalilais moog ti nkaus saab qaabteb.”

Mauxes has txug xeem Aseles le nuav: “Aseles tau koob moov ntau dlua lwm xeem huv tuabsi. Thov kuas nwg cov kwvtij hlub nwg tshaaj lwm xeem, hab thov kuas nwg lub tebchaws muaj txiv ntoo roj nplua mag.
Thov kuas nwg tej nroog muaj roojvaag hlau thaiv khov kho, hab thov kuas nwg nyob tso sab lug moog ibtxhis.”
Cov Yixalayees, tsi muaj lwm tug vaajtswv zoo npaum le mej tug Vaajtswv, nwg moog sau nruab ntug, nwg lub fwjchim ci ntsaa ab, nwg nqeg nroog sau cov fuab lug cawm kuas mej dlim.
Vaajtswv yog tug kws ibtxwm tsomkwm mej; nwg ob txhais npaab puag rawv mej moog ibtxhis. Nwg ntab mej tej yeebncuab tsiv tawm ntawm mej moog, hab nwg kuas mej ua rua yeebncuab puamtsuaj tu noob nrho.
Yakhauj cov xeebntxwv txhaj tau nyob kaaj sab lug. Puab yuav nyob tso sab plhuav huv lub tebchaws kws zoo nplej hab muaj cawv txiv maab, lub tebchaws ntawd aav noo hab ntsu lwg.

Cov Yixalayees, ua caag mej yuav tau zoo ua luaj! Mej yog tsaav tuabneeg kws tug TSWV cawm dlim lawm; tsi muaj ib tsaav tuabneeg twg kws tau zoo le mej. Tug TSWV yog mej dlaim thaiv nav ntaaj, hab yog mej raab ntaaj kws paab kuas mej kovyeej; mej tej yeebncuab yuav tsaa suab thov kuas mej hlub, hab mej yuav muab puab tsuj nthi rua huv aav.

Mauxes tawm huv lub taj nraag Mau-am moog rua sau Roob Nenpaus, hab nwg nce moog txug rua sau lub ncov Roob Pinkas kws nyob saab nubtuaj ntawm lub nroog Yelikaus; thaus Mauxes nce moog txug sau lawm, tug TSWV kuas nwg tsaa qhovmuag saib thoob plawg lub tebchaws. Nwg pum lub tebchaws Nkile-as thoob plawg moog ti nkaus lub nroog Daas;
nwg saib pum taagnrho tej cheebtsaam kws Nathalis, Efalayees, Manaxes hab Yudas nyob moog rua saab Nubpoob ti nkaus rua Havtxwv Meditelanees;
nwg pum taagnrho tebchaws Yudas saab qaabteb, hab lub taj nraag txij ndlua ntawm lub nroog Xau-as moog ti nkaus lub nroog Yelikaus kws muaj toovlaaj ntau heev.

Tug TSWV has rua Mauxes tas, “Lub tebchaws nuav yog lub kws kuv tau coglug tseg rua Anplahaas, Ixaj hab Yakhauj has tas, kuv yuav muab rua puab cov xeebntxwv. Kuv pub rua koj pum, tabsis tsi pub koj moog nyob.”
Tug TSWV tug tubkhai Mauxes txhaj tuag rua huv tebchaws Mau-am lawv le tug TSWV tau has tseg lawm.

Tug TSWV muab Mauxes log rua huv ib lub haav huv tebchaws Mau-am kws nyob ncaaj lub nroog Npepe-aus, tabsis txij thaus ntawd lug txug naj nub nua, yeej tsi muaj leejtwg paub has tas tug TSWV muab Mauxes lub cev coj moog log rua qhov twg lawm.
Thaus Mauxes tuag, nwg noobnyoog muaj ib puas neeg nkaum xyoo; txawm yog nwg laug heev los nwg tseem muaj zug hab qhovmuag pum kev zoo.
Cov Yixalayees quaj nyav Mauxes tau peb caug nub huv lub taj nraag Mau-am.
Noos tug tub Yausuas muaj tswvyim, Mauxes txhaj tsaa nwg ua tug hloov Mauxes chaw. Cov Yixalayees noog Yausuas lug lawv le tej lug kws tug TSWV kuas Mauxes qha rua puab.
Txij thaus ntawd lug cov Yixalayees tsi muaj ib tug cevlug zoo npaum le Mauxes kws tug TSWV nrug nwg thaam tim ntsej tim muag le lawm.
Tsi muaj ib tug cevlug twg kws ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb hab xaav tsi thoob ib yaam le tej kws tug TSWV kuas Mauxes ua rua Falaus, nwg cov numtswv hab nwg cov pejxeem huv lub tebchaws Iziv pum.
Tsi muaj ib tug cevlug twg kws ua tau tej txujci tseemceeb hab txaus ntshai ib yaam le tej kws Mauxes ua rua cov Yixalayees pum lawm.
